43007039	Nau Brah Yêsu ngơi ma dak rlai i nây, Păng ŭch ngơi ma Brah Huêng Ueh. Bu moh nsing ma Brah Yêsu, păng i nây sŏ dơn Brah Huêng Ueh gŭ ndrel. Yơn ma nôk nây Kôranh Brah ê hŏ ôh ăn Brah Huêng Ueh gŭ ndrel bunuyh, yorlah Brah Yêsu ê hŏ khât dâk rêh lăp ta nau chrêk lơp Păng nơm.
43007040	Tât ma phung ƀon lan tăng nau Brah Yêsu ngơi nây, bunuyh aƀă lah: “Păng i nây ro bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah i Môsê lĕ nchih kăl e nơh, Păng mra văch ta neh ntu dja.”
43007041	Bunuyh aƀă lah: “Păng i nây ro Brah Krist.” Yơn ma geh bunuyh aƀă rlăch: “Brah Krist gĭt ma lôh tă bơh bri Galilê lah?
43007042	Yorlah ta Nau Kôranh Brah Ngơi lah, Brah Krist deh bơh rnoi deh kađăch Đavid, ndrel ma lôh tă bơh ƀon Ƀêtlêhem, i ntŭk ƀon deh kađăch Đavid nơm ƀah?”
43007043	Ndri jan ăn phung ƀon lan geh nau tâm nkhah nkhat băl, yor ma Brah Yêsu.
43007044	Geh bunuyh aƀă ŭch nhŭp Brah Yêsu, yơn ma mâu geh ôh bunuyh nhŭp Păng.
43007045	Jêh ri phung tahen i mât njrăng nhih jan brah plơ̆ sât ta mpôl kôranh jan brah, ndrel ma phung Pharisi ri. Phung i nây ôp phung tahen: “Moh kô̆ khân may mâu nhŭp Păng leo ta dja?”
43007046	Phung tahen i nây ơh: “Hên mâu geh ôh nhŭp Păng, yorlah hên mâu vay say bunuyh blao ngơi nti kơt Păng i nây.”
43007047	Phung Pharisi lah khân păng: “Khân may lĕ iăt đŏng nau mƀrôh Păng bơh?
43007048	Ta phung kôranh kuŏng, ndrel ma dâng lĕ phung Pharisi, mâu geh ôh du huê bunuyh nsing ma Păng.
43007049	Yơn ma phung ƀon lan i nây, khân păng mâu ôh gĭt nau vay phung bân. Dâng lĕ phung i nây Kôranh Brah lĕ rtăp ngăn ro!”
43007050	Geh du huê rnha Nikôđêm, păng jêng phung Pharisi đŏng, a lor nơh păng lĕ hăn tâm mâp ma Brah Yêsu, păng ôp phung Pharisi:
43007051	“Tâng ma nau vay phung bân, lah bân ê hŏ ôh tăng bunuyh tih nơm ngơi, ê hŏ ôh gĭt n'hêl nau păng jan, ơm dơi phat dôih păng lah?”
43007052	Phung Pharisi nây ơh ma păng: “May ngơi tâm ban may jêng bunuyh bri Galilê rluk mâl đŏng. Lŏng may uănh ta Nau Kôranh Brah Ngơi, mâu geh ôh du huê bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah lôh tă bơh bri Galilê.”
43007053	[Jêh bơh nây khân păng plơ̆ sât ta nhih jay khân păng nơm.]
43008001	[Jêh ri Brah Yêsu hao ta kalơ yôk tơm Ôlive, gŭ bêch ta nây.
43008002	Tât ơm ôi Păng plơ̆ tay ta jŏng gung nhih jan brah ma Kôranh Brah, geh dâng lĕ phung ƀon lan hăn mâp Păng, jêh ri Păng gŭ rgơp ntŭm nti khân păng.
43008003	Nôk nây phung nơm nti nau vay phung Israel, ndrel ma phung Pharisi leo du huê bu ur bu ban păng gŭ bêch đah bu klô i mâu di sai păng nơm. Bu têk bu ur i nây gŭ ta nklang n'gul phung gŭ ta nây,
43008004	jêh ri khân păng lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Nơm Nti, bu ur dja hên ban păng tâm lŏm ur sai.
43008005	Ta nau vay Môsê, lĕ đă bân ntŭp bu ur jan tih kơt nđa ma lŭ ăn khât. Lah ndri May, mơm May lah mêh?”
43008006	Khân păng ôp rlong Brah Yêsu kơt nây, ŭch joi nau ntôn Păng. Yơn ma Brah Yêsu gŭ chŭn jât neh, jêh ri nchih nau ta neh môi ma lau ti.
43008007	Yor ma phung nây jŏl ko ôp Brah Yêsu, Păng n'gâl, jêh ri lah: “Ta phung khân may, bu moh i mâu geh jan tih, ăn păng i nây ntŭp bu ur i dja ma lŭ lor bu dô!”
43008008	Jêh ri Păng chŭn nchih tay ta neh môi nây jât.
43008009	Tât ma khân păng tăng nau Brah Yêsu lah kơt nây, jêh ri khân păng ntơm du lôh bơh ntŭk nây de mrôch, ntơm bơh bu ranh n'ho ma tât lĕ. Hôm e ta nây Brah Yêsu, ndrel ma bu ur i nây nơh dơm.
43008010	Brah Yêsu n'gâl, jêh ri lah ma bu ur i nây: “Ơ yôh, ah hăn phung khân păng yot rngăt? Mâu geh du huê ŭch tê̆ dôih ay?”
43008011	Bu ur i nây ơh: “Mâu geh ôh, Kôranh.” Brah Yêsu lah ma păng: “Gâp mâu đŏng tê̆ dôih ay, ay sât dô, yơn ma ntơm bơh nar dja, ay lơi hôm ôh jan tih.”]
43008012	Brah Yêsu ngơi tay ma phung ƀon lan: “Gâp dja jêng tâm ban ma nau ang ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja, bu moh tâng Gâp, păng mâu hôm ôh gŭ rêh ta nau ngo, yorlah păng mra geh nau ang i ăn nau rêh.”
43008013	Phung Pharisi lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Nau May ngơi i nây lôh êng tă bơh May nơm dơm, mâu geh bunuyh a êng mbơh nau May ngơi i nây, lah ndri nau May ngơi i nây mâu ôh kơp geh nau khlay.”
43008014	Brah Yêsu lah: “Bol lah nau Gâp ngơi dja lôh êng tă bơh săk Gâp nơm dơm kađôi, nau Gâp ngơi dja hôm geh nau khlay, yorlah Gâp gĭt săk Gâp nơm bơh tă, jêh ri gĭt đŏng ntŭk Gâp hăn. Yơn ma phung khân may nơh mâu ôh gĭt Gâp bơh tă, jêh ri mâu đŏng gĭt ah ntŭk Gâp hăn.
43008015	Khân may phat dôih tâng nau vay phung bunuyh. Gâp mâu ôh phat dôih bu, du huê mâu ơm.
43008016	Lah Gâp phat dôih bu, nau Gâp phat dôih i nây jêng di ngăn, yorlah Gâp mâu ôh phat dôih êng Gâp nơm dơm, geh Bơ̆ Gâp Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp đŏng gŭ ndrel Gâp.
43008017	Ta nau vay khân may lĕ geh nchih: ‘Lah geh bar hê bunuyh mbơh nkoch, ri mơ kơp nau i nây geh nau khlay’.
43008018	Gâp mbơh nkoch nau săk Gâp nơm dja, jêh ri geh Bơ̆ Gâp Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp văch đŏng, mbơh nkoch nau săk Gâp nơm dja.”
43008019	Bu ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ah Bơ̆ May?” Păng ơh: “Khân may mâu gĭt năl Gâp, khân may mâu đŏng gĭt năl Bơ̆ Gâp. Lah khân may gĭt năl Gâp, ri mơ khân may gĭt năl Bơ̆ Gâp đŏng.”
43008020	Brah Yêsu ngơi nau nây, nôk Păng gŭ nti lah bu ta jŏng gung nhih jan brah, dăch kêng ntŭk ăn hŭp prăk, yơn ma mâu geh ôh bunuyh bănh nhŭp Păng, yorlah ê hŏ tât di mong.
43008021	Brah Yêsu lah tay khân păng: “Gâp tay du, khân may tay joi Gâp, yơn ma khân may khât nđâp ma nau tih khân may nơm. Ntŭk Gâp hăn, khân may mâu ôh dơi hăn.”
43008022	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel tâm lah ndrăng khân păng: “Moh geh nau khlay lah pre nây: ‘Ntŭk Gâp hăn, khân may mâu ôh dơi hăn’? Gĭt Păng nkhât êng săk Păng nơm?”
43008023	Brah Yêsu lah tay: “Khân may tă bơh neh ntu dja, yơn ma Gâp tă bơh kalơ trôk i ntŭk Kôranh Brah nơm. Khân may jêng ndơ neh ntu dja, yơn ma Gâp, Gâp mâu ôh jêng ndơ neh ntu dja.
43008024	Gâp lĕ mbơh ma khân may: ‘Khân may khât nđâp ma nau tih khân may nơm’, yorlah, lah khân may mâu ôh iăt nau Gâp mbơh nkoch nau săk Gâp nơm dja, khân may khât hôm nđâp ma nau tih khân may nơm ngăn ro, mâu ôh geh yô̆ nau tih.”
43008025	Bu ôp Brah Yêsu: “Lah ndri May bu moh?” Brah Yêsu ơh: “Gâp lĕ ơm mbơh jêh ma khân may.
43008026	Gâp geh ŏk ngăn nau gay ma ŭch mbơh nkoch ăn ma khân may, nđâp ma phat dôih khân may, yơn ma Gâp mâu ŭch ôh mbơh nkoch, yorlah Kôranh Brah nơm tơm njuăl Gâp, Păng jan tâng nau Păng mbơh nâng, jêh ri moh nau Gâp tăng tă bơh Păng, nau i nây dơm Gâp mbơh nkoch ăn ma bunuyh ta neh ntu dja.”
43008027	Yơn ma phung khân păng mâu vât ôh nau Brah Yêsu mbơh nkoch Kôranh Brah Bơ̆ Păng ăn ma khân păng nây.
43008028	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Ta nar khân may n'hao Gâp i Kon Bunuyh tă bơh Kôranh Brah ri tay, ta ri mơ khân may gĭt lah Gâp dja bu moh, gĭt lah ndơ Gâp jan, mâu geh ôh jan tâng săk Gâp nơm ŭch. Gâp ngơi nau i nây tâng nau Bơ̆ Gâp đă ma Gâp.
43008029	Kôranh Brah Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp, Păng mâu ôh ntlơi Gâp gŭ êng, Păng gŭ ndrel Gâp, yorlah dâng lĕ ndơ Gâp jan ăn Păng răm maak mro.”
43008030	Nôk Brah Yêsu ngơi nây, geh ŏk bunuyh sât nsing ma Păng.
43008031	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu ngơi ma phung Israel i lĕ nsing ma Păng: “Lah khân ay may gŭ nâp ta nau Gâp nti, khân ay may jêng oh mon Gâp ngăn,
43008032	jêh ri khân ay may gĭt năl nau ngăn, jêh ri nau ngăn mra rklaih khân ay may ăn jêng bunuyh kon me.”
43008033	Phung khân păng lah: “Mơm dâng May lah hên: ‘Khân ay may mra jêng bunuyh kon me?’, yorlah hên i dja kon sau Abrahăm i che dâng lĕ phung Israel bân, hên mâu prot ôh gŭ jan dâk bu.”
43008034	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân ay may, bu moh jan tih, păng i nây jêng tâm ban ma dâk ma nau tih mâu blao bah jan tih.
43008035	Bunuyh dâk bu, păng mâu ôh gŭ mro ta jay kôranh păng nơm, yơn ma kon kôranh nơm, păng gŭ mro ta jay bơ̆ păng nơm nây.
43008036	Lah ndri, lah Gâp i Kon Kôranh Brah rklaih khân ay may, khân ay may jêng bunuyh kon me ngăn ro.
43008037	Gâp lĕ gĭt khân ay may phung kon sau Abrahăm, yơn ma khân ay may ŭch nkhât Gâp, yorlah dâng lĕ nau Gâp ngơi, nuih n'hâm khân ay may mâu ôh sŏ dơn.
43008038	Moh nau Gâp mbơh nkoch ma khân ay may, jêng ndơ Gâp lĕ say ta Bơ̆ Gâp nơm, yơn ma khân ay may jan tâng nau bơ̆ khân ay may nơm mbơh.”
43008039	Khân păng lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Bơ̆ hên Abrahăm.” Brah Yêsu lah: “Lah khân ay may phung kon sau Abrahăm ngăn, khân ay may jan ndơ kơt Abrahăm lĕ jan đŏng.
43008040	Aƀaơ dja Gâp mbơh nkoch ma khân ay may nau ngăn, nau i Gâp tăng tă bơh Kôranh Brah, tih ma khân ay may ŭch nkhât Gâp. Yơn ma Abrahăm mâu ôh jan kơt nđay.
43008041	Khân ay may jan ndơ bơ̆ khân ay may nơm jan.” Khân păng lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Hên dja kon me gle ăl ngăn, bơ̆ hên Kôranh Brah du huê dơm.”
43008042	Brah Yêsu lah tay ma khân păng: “Lah Kôranh Brah bơ̆ khân ay may ngăn, di lah khân ay may rŏng ma Gâp đŏng, yorlah Gâp dja lôh tă bơh Kôranh Brah văch ta dja. Gâp mâu ôh lôh tâng săk Gâp nơm ŭch, Kôranh Brah Nơm njuăl Gâp văch ta dja.
43008043	Mơm dâng khân ay may mâu vât nau Gâp nti? Yorlah khân ay may mâu blao iăt nau Gâp nti.
43008044	Bơ̆ khân ay may nơh Satăng i kôranh mpôl brah djơh, khân ay may ŭch jan tâng nau păng ŭch. Păng nkhât bunuyh bơh ntơm saơm ngăn, păng i nơm mƀrôh, ndrel ma păng mâu ôh ngơi nau ngăn, yorlah ta nuih n'hâm păng mâu geh ôh nau ngăn. Dôl păng mbơh ngơi mƀrôh, păng tâm di ma nuih n'hâm păng nơm ro, yorlah păng nơh jêng nơm mƀrôh, ndrel ma jêng nơm tơm dâng lĕ nau mƀrôh đŏng.
43008045	Ndri dâng khân ay may mâu ôh iăt nau Gâp, yorlah Gâp nti nau ngăn.
43008046	Ta phung khân ay may nây, ơm geh lah du huê bunuyh dơi ntôn Gâp geh jan nau tih? Lah Gâp nti nau ngăn, mơm dâng khân ay may mâu iăt Gâp?
43008047	Bu moh jêng ƀon lan Kôranh Brah, păng i nây iăt nau Kôranh Brah. Khân ay may mâu ôh jêng ƀon lan Kôranh Brah, ndri dâng khân ay may mâu iăt nau Gâp nây.”
43008048	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel lah Brah Yêsu: “Di mâu lah mâu, lah hên lah May phung bri Samari geh brah djơh gŭ ta May?”
43008049	Brah Yêsu ơh: “Gâp mâu ôh geh brah djơh gŭ ta Gâp, Gâp yơk ma Bơ̆ Gâp nơm, tih ma khân may mưch rmot Gâp chrao.
43008050	Gâp mâu ôh joi gay ma lư êng săk Gâp nơm, yơn ma geh du huê sơm joi ăn lư Gâp, Păng i Kôranh phat dôih sŏng đŏng.
43008051	Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, bu moh ndjôt tâng nau Gâp nti, păng mâu geh khât ôh.”
43008052	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel lah Brah Yêsu: “Aƀaơ dja hên lĕ gĭt May geh brah djơh gŭ ta May ngăn ro, yorlah Abrahăm, ndrel ma mpôl bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah kăl e nơh lĕ khât lĕ phiao, yơn ma May, May lah: ‘Bu moh ndjôt tâng nau Gâp nti, păng mâu geh khât ôh’.
43008053	Ơm May kuŏng rlau che hên Abrahăm ƀah? Yorlah păng, ndrel ma mpôl bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah kăl e nơh lĕ khât lĕ phiao. Lah ndri May i nây, mơm May kơp săk May nơm mêh?”
43008054	Brah Yêsu lah: “Lah Gâp joi gay ma lư êng săk Gâp nơm, nau lư i nây mâu ôh geh nau khlay. Yơn ma Bơ̆ Gâp nơm ŭch bu lư săk Gâp, Păng i Kôranh Brah i khân may lah yơk mbah nây nơh.
43008055	Khân may mâu ôh gĭt năl Păng, yơn ma Gâp, Gâp gĭt năl Păng. Lah Gâp lah, Gâp mâu ôh gĭt năl Păng, Gâp jêng bunuyh ngơi mƀrôh tâm ban ma khân may đŏng. Yơn ma Gâp lĕ năl Păng ngăn, ndrel ma ndjôt nau Păng ngơi jât.
43008056	Abrahăm che khân may, păng răm maak ngăn nôk Kôranh Brah ăn păng gĭt lor, păng mra say nau Gâp văch. Păng lĕ say Gâp văch ngăn ro, jêh ri păng răm maak hô ngăn.”
43008057	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel lah Brah Yêsu: “May ê hŏ tât 50 năm! Mơm dâng May lah lĕ say Abrahăm?”
43008058	Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, nôk Abrahăm ê hŏ deh, Gâp lĕ ơm geh jêh.”
43008059	Kơt ndri dâng khân păng dônh lŭ gay ma ntŭp nkhât Brah Yêsu, yơn ma Păng krap bơh khân păng nây, jêh ri lôh bơh jŏng gung nhih jan brah ri.
43009001	Nôk Brah Yêsu hăn rŏ trong, Păng say du huê bu klô cheh măt ntơm bơh ndŭl me.
43009002	Mpôl oh mon ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Nơm Nti, bơh tă nau tih i nây, dâng păng cheh măt ntơm bơh ndŭl me kơt nây? Tă bơh păng nơm jan tih, mâu lah tă bơh mê̆ bơ̆ păng jan tih?”
43009003	Brah Yêsu ơh: “Mâu ôh tă bơh nau tih păng nơm, mâu đŏng nau tih mê̆ bơ̆ păng. Păng cheh măt yorlah Kôranh Brah ŭch ăn bu say nau dơi Păng nơm ta bunuyh i nây.
43009004	Iăt ma bân hôm jan kar ma Kôranh Brah Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp văch, nôk trôk hôm ang. Măng bơi tât, jêh ri lah trôk lĕ măng mâu hôm ôh geh bunuyh dơi jan kar.
43009005	Nôk Gâp hôm gŭ ta neh ntu dja, Gâp tâm ban ma nau ang ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja.”
43009006	Jêh Brah Yêsu ngơi kơt nây, Păng soh dak diu ta neh, lai dak diu i nây ma neh, hâng ta măt bunuyh cheh nây.
43009007	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu đă păng: “Hăn hŏm, hăn rpôh măt may nây ta dak nglao Silom ri” - rblang ngơi lah ‘Silom’ nây ‘Bu đă hăn’, jêng dak nglao i bu jan. Bunuyh cheh măt nây hăn rpôh ro, jêh ri măt păng say ang păng sât bơh ri.
43009008	Phung chiao meng, ndrel ma phung vay say păng gŭ dăn prăk bu a lor nơh, khân păng tâm lah: “Bu klô i nây ƀah gŭ dăn bu a lor nơh?”
43009009	Geh bunuyh aƀă lah: “Păng i nây ro.” Bunuyh aƀă jât lah: “Mâu, mâu di păng ôh, păng tâm trŭp măt dơm.” Yơn ma păng nơm i tă cheh măt nây lah: “Gâp ya.”
43009010	Bu ôp păng: “Mơm dâng ang măt may i nây nơh?”
43009011	Păng mbơh ma bu: “Geh du huê bunuyh rnha Yêsu, Păng sŏ dak bŏk hâng ta măt gâp, jêh ri đă gâp hăn rpôh ta dak nglao Silom. Gâp hăn rpôh, măt gâp say ang ro.”
43009012	Bu ôp bunuyh cheh măt nây: “Ah Păng aƀaơ?” Bunuyh cheh măt nây ơh: “Gĭt eh!”
43009013	Jêh ri bu leo bunuyh i tă cheh măt i nây hăn ta phung Pharisi.
43009014	Nôk Brah Yêsu lai dak diu Păng nơm ma neh, ndrel ma jan ăn măt bunuyh say ang nây nơh jêng ta nar Saƀăt i nar rlu phung Israel,
43009015	kơt ndri dâng phung Pharisi ôp bunuyh tă cheh măt i nây: “Mơm dâng ang măt may nây nơh?” Bunuyh cheh măt nây mbơh ma phung Pharisi: “Păng sŏ dak bŏk hâng ta măt gâp, jêh ri gâp rpôh, măt gâp say ang ro.”
43009016	Phung Pharisi aƀă tâm lah ndrăng khân păng: “Bunuyh i nây mâu geh ôh lôh tă bơh Kôranh Brah, yorlah Păng mâu jan tâng nau vay ta nar Saƀăt i nar rlu.” Aƀă jât lah: “Lah Bunuyh tih, mơm dâng Păng dơi jan nau khlay kơt nđa?” Jêh ri khân păng jêng tâm nkhah mpôl.
43009017	Jêh ri khân păng ôp tay bunuyh i tă cheh măt nây jât: “Lah ndri ah may, Păng i tơm jan măt may say ang nây, bu moh may lah mêh?” Bunuyh cheh măt nây ơh: “Păng bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah.”
43009018	Yơn ma mpôl kôranh phung Israel ê hŏ iăt ôh lah bunuyh i nây bơh ntơm nơh păng cheh, aƀaơ dja lĕ say ang, khân păng kuăl i mê̆ bơ̆ păng ƀŏt.
43009019	Brô̆ tât ta nây, khân păng ôp: “Bunuyh dja kon khân ay may ngăn? Khân ay may lah păng cheh măt ntơm bơh ndŭl me, aƀaơ dja mơm dâng măt păng jêng ang?”
43009020	Mê̆ bơ̆ păng ơh: “Păng kon hên ngăn, hên lĕ gĭt n'hêl păng cheh măt ntơm bơh ndŭl me ngăn đŏng,
43009021	yơn ma bơh tă măt păng dâng say ang hên mâu gĭt ôh. Bu moh jan ăn măt păng say ang nây, hên mâu gĭt đŏng. Khân may ôp êng săk păng nơm ta nây, păng lĕ kuŏng, lĕ blao mbơh nkoch êng săk păng nơm.”
43009022	Dâng mê̆ bơ̆ păng ngơi kơt nây, khân păng klach mpôl kôranh phung Israel, yorlah mpôl kôranh phung Israel lĕ tâm di nau, lah bu moh kơp Brah Yêsu jêng Brah Krist, bu mprơh lơi ăn lôh bơh ntŭk nhih rƀŭn phung Israel khân păng nơm.
43009023	Kơt ndri dâng mê̆ bơ̆ păng lah: “Khân may ôp êng săk păng nơm ta nây eh, yorlah păng lĕ kuŏng.”
43009024	Jêh ri bu kuăl tay bunuyh tă cheh măt nây ôp tay du tơ̆ jât, bu lah păng: “Hên đă may ngơi nau ngăn hŏm ta năp măt Kôranh Brah! Hên lĕ gĭt jêh Bunuyh i nây, Păng Bunuyh jan tih ngăn.”
43009025	Bunuyh i tă cheh măt nây ơh ma khân păng: “Gâp mâu gĭt ôh Păng bunuyh jan tih, mâu lah mâu. Yơn ma gâp gĭt săk gâp nơm, bơh ntơm nơh măt gâp cheh, aƀaơ dja măt gâp lĕ say ang.”
43009026	Khân păng ôp tay păng: “Lah ndri mơm Păng jan ăn măt may say ang nây nơh mêh? Mă ndơ Păng jan mêh?”
43009027	Bunuyh cheh măt nây ơh: “Gâp lĕ jêh nkoch ma khân may, tih ma khân may mâu ŭch iăt ôh. Aƀaơ dja mơm dâng khân may ŭch đă gâp nkoch tay du tơ̆ jât? Khân may ŭch jan oh mon Păng đŏng ƀah?”
43009028	Khân păng mưch rmot ôbăl: “May i lah oh mon Păng, hên dja oh mon che Môsê.
43009029	Hên gĭt Kôranh Brah lĕ ngơi ma Môsê ngăn, yơn ma Bunuyh i nây hên mâu gĭt ôh, bơh tă nau dơi Păng!”
43009030	Bunuyh i tă cheh măt i nây lah: “Gâp mâu vât ôh khân may lah mâu gĭt bơh tă nau dơi Păng, yơn ma Păng lĕ jan ăn măt gâp say ang.
43009031	Bân lĕ gĭt, lah bunuyh jan tih, Kôranh Brah mâu iăt ôh. Bunuyh blao klach yơk ma Păng, ndrel ma jan tâng nau Păng ŭch mơ Păng iăt.
43009032	Ntơm bơh Kôranh Brah rhăk njêng neh ntu, ê hŏ prot tăng geh bunuyh blao jan bunuyh cheh măt bơh ndŭl me ăn say ang.
43009033	Lah Bunuyh i nây mâu geh lôh tă bơh Kôranh Brah, Păng mâu ôh dơi jan ndơ kơt nây.”
43009034	Bu lah ma păng: “May jêng bunuyh jan tih hô ngăn bơh ndŭl me, mơm may bănh nti lah ma hên!” Jêh ri bu mprơh ôbăl lôh a dih.
43009035	Brah Yêsu tăng bu mprơh bunuyh i tă cheh măt nây nơh lôh a dih, jêh ri Brah Yêsu joi mâp păng, ôp: “Ah may nsing đŏng ma Kon Bunuyh i tă bơh Kôranh Brah?”
43009036	Păng ơh: “Ơ Kôranh, ah Păng i ri mêh, sơm mbơh ăn gâp, gâp be ma nsing ma Păng.”
43009037	Brah Yêsu lah: “May lĕ say Păng, Păng dja heh i lĕ tâm ngơi ma may aƀaơ dja.”
43009038	Bunuyh cheh măt nây lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, gâp nsing ma May.” Jêh ri bunuyh cheh măt nây yơk mbah Brah Yêsu ta nây ro.
43009039	Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp văch ta neh ntu dja, gay ma phat dôih dâng lĕ bunuyh, jêh ri ăn bunuyh cheh măt jêng say ang, nđâp ma nhhơ ma bunuyh i kơp êng măt khân păng nơm say ang, khân păng ƀêng ma cheh, yorlah bunuyh gĭt năl Kôranh Brah ngăn tâm ban ma say ang.”
43009040	Phung Pharisi i gŭ ndrel Brah Yêsu ta nây, tăng Păng lah kơt nây, jêh ri ôp Păng: “Lah ndri May kuăl hên dja bunuyh cheh măt ƀah?”
43009041	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Lah khân may bunuyh cheh măt ngăn ta nau mân, mâu gĭt vât nau Kôranh Brah, khân may mâu ôh geh dôih, tih ma khân may kơp êng măt khân may say ang lĕ gĭt vât nau Kôranh Brah, yơn ma mâu ôh rom Gâp, kơt ndri dôih hôm krêp mro ta khân may.”
43010001	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu lah jât: “Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, bu moh lăp ta trôm n'gar be biăp, mâu ôh lăp rŏ mpông n'gar, ƀêng ma hao lăp nkhơng trong êng chrao, păng i nây jêng bunuyh ntŭng.
43010002	Yơn ma bu moh lăp rŏ mpông n'gar, bunuyh i nây ngăn ro jêng nơm chiăp be biăp i gŭ ta trôm n'gar i nây.
43010003	Bunuyh mât njrăng n'gar păng sơm pơk mpông ma nơm chiăp be biăp i nây ăn lăp. Dâng lĕ be biăp năl bŏr mbung bunuyh i chiăp khân păng dadê, bunuyh i nây kuăl dâng lĕ be biăp păng nơm nây tâng rnha êng êng, jêh ri păng leo be biăp lôh bơh dih n'gar nây.
43010004	Tât be biăp lĕ lôh bơh dih n'gar lĕ phiao, păng nơm brô̆ bơh năp, be biăp tâng bơh kơi bơh kơi păng nơm, yorlah dâng lĕ be biăp i nây lĕ năl bŏr mbung păng dadê.
43010005	Phung be biăp i nây mâu ôh tâng bu êng, khân păng nchuăt ngai bơh bu êng ro, yorlah khân păng mâu ôh gĭt năl bŏr mbung bu êng.”
43010006	Brah Yêsu ngơi nau ntât i nây ma phung Pharisi i gŭ ta nây, yơn ma khân păng mâu vât ôh, moh nau Păng ŭch ngơi i nây.
43010007	Ndri dâng Brah Yêsu ngơi tay du tơ̆ jât ma khân păng: “Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, Gâp dja jêng tâm ban ma mpông be biăp ma lôh lăp.
43010008	Dâng lĕ nơm nti phung Israel, ndrel ma dâng lĕ kôranh phung Israel i hăn lor bơh năp Gâp, tih ma nti nklă, khân păng bunuyh ntŭng dadê, be biăp i nây mâu iăt ôh bŏr mbung khân păng.
43010009	Gâp dja tâm ban ma mpông, bu moh lăp rŏ mpông i nây mra geh nau rklaih, Gâp mât njrăng păng tâm ban ma be biăp lôh lăp bơh trôm n'gar say rêp sa đŏng.
43010010	Bunuyh ntŭng văch, păng gay ma ntŭng, ma nkhât, ma lơh ndjơh dơm. Yơn ma Gâp văch, gay ma ăn bunuyh geh nau rêh, geh nau rêh dŭt ueh ngăn.”
43010011	“Gâp dja i Nơm chiăp ueh. Nơm chiăp ueh Păng jao săk Păng nơm ăn ma be biăp Păng.
43010012	Lŏng bunuyh chiăp jan kar gay ma geh ndơ nkhôm dơm, mâu ôh di jêng bunuyh chiăp ngăn, mâu ôh di jêng nơm tơm be biăp i nây, lah say tât so bri văch, păng nchuăt ntlơi be biăp ro, ăn so bri kăp sa hêk khân păng, nđâp ma jan ăn khân păng nchuăt chah chrai đŏng.
43010013	Păng nchuăt nơh, yorlah păng jan kar gay ma geh ndơ nkhôm dơm, păng mâu ôh rvê ma be biăp.
43010014	Yơn ma Gâp, Gâp nơm chiăp ueh, Gâp gĭt năl be biăp Gâp nơm, jêh ri be biăp Gâp gĭt năl Gâp
43010015	tâm ban ma Bơ̆ Gâp gĭt năl Gâp, jêh ri Gâp gĭt năl Bơ̆ Gâp đŏng. Gâp jao săk Gâp nơm ăn ma be biăp Gâp.
43010016	Gâp hôm geh đŏng be biăp aƀă êng mâu ôh gŭ ta trôm n'gar dja, geh nau khlay lah geh bunuyh i mâu di phung Israel mra jêng phung ƀon lan Gâp đŏng, iăt ma Gâp leo khân păng lăp ta n'gar đŏng. Khân păng i nây mra iăt bŏr mbung Gâp. Lah ndri dâng lĕ khân păng jêng du phung dơm, jêh ri geh du huê dơm đŏng Nơm chiăp.”
43010017	“Bơ̆ Gâp rŏng ma Gâp, yorlah Gâp jao săk Gâp nơm, gay ma sŏ tay nau rêh.
43010018	Mâu geh ôh du huê dơi nkhât Gâp, Gâp nơm dơm jao săk Gâp nơm khât. Gâp geh nau dơi jao săk Gâp nơm khât, geh nau dơi sŏ tay nau rêh. Nau i nây Bơ̆ Gâp lĕ đă ma Gâp.”
43010019	Nôk nây mpôl kôranh phung Israel tâm nkhah mpôl tay du tơ̆ jât, yor ma nau ngơi Brah Yêsu i nây.
43010020	Geh ŏk bunuyh lah: “Păng lĕ geh brah djơh gŭ ta Păng, Păng lĕ jêng trơi. Lơi hôm iăt nau ngơi Păng.”
43010021	Yơn ma bunuyh aƀă lah: “Nau ngơi i nây mâu ôh tă bơh bunuyh geh brah djơh gŭ ta păng, yorlah brah djơh mâu dơi ôh jan ăn say ang bunuyh cheh măt.”
43010022	Nôk khay ji kăt nây, ta ƀon Yêrusalem ri bu jan nhêt ƀŭn lăp nhih jan brah ma Kôranh Brah.
43010023	Brah Yêsu hăn rsong ta jŏng gung nhih jan brah rŏ ndring Salômôn ri.
43010024	Jêh ri mpôl kôranh phung Israel gŭ jŭm Brah Yêsu, khân păng ôp: “Dah hôm jŏ May ŭch ăn hên hôm vĭ vĕ, May mâu mbơh n'hêl ma hên May Brah Krist mâu lah mâu? Lah May Brah Krist ngăn, ăn May mbơh hŏm ma hên.”
43010025	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Gâp lĕ mbơh nkoch ma khân may, yơn ma khân may mâu ôh ŭch iăt nau Gâp. Dâng lĕ nau khlay Gâp jan tă bơh nau dơi Bơ̆ Gâp, ndơ i nây ăn khân may gĭt say.
43010026	Yơn ma khân may mâu ŭch iăt, yorlah khân may mâu ôh di ƀon lan Gâp i tâm ban ma be biăp Gâp nơm.
43010027	Dâng lĕ bunuyh i tâm ban ma be biăp Gâp nơm iăt bŏr mbung Gâp. Gâp gĭt năl khân păng, jêh ri khân păng tâng Gâp bơh kơi.
43010028	Gâp ăn khân păng nau rêh n'ho ro, khân păng mâu ôh mra roh hêng, mâu đŏng geh du huê dơi pit khân păng bơh ti Gâp.
43010029	Bơ̆ Gâp dŭt kuŏng rlau bu ngăn, Păng i tơm ăn khân păng i nây ma Gâp, mâu geh ôh du huê dơi pit khân păng bơh ti Păng.
43010030	Gâp ndrel Bơ̆ Gâp, jêng nguai dơm.”
43010031	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel dônh lŭ, gay ma klŭp nkhât Brah Yêsu du tơ̆ jât.
43010032	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Gâp lĕ jan ndơ ueh tă bơh Bơ̆ Gâp nơm ŏk ngăn nhhơ ăn khân may say, lah ndri moh ndơ Gâp jan ndơ i nây, dâng khân may ŭch klŭp Gâp ma lŭ?”
43010033	Khân păng lah ma Păng: “Hên klŭp May ma lŭ, mâu geh ôh yor ma May jan ndơ ueh, ach ma May ngơi mưch rmot Kôranh Brah, yorlah May bunuyh dơm, May kơp êng săk May nơm lah May tâm ban ma Kôranh Brah.”
43010034	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Ta nau vay khân may lĕ nchih lah: ‘Kôranh Brah lah: ‘Gâp mbơh ma khân may, khân may jêng brah’’.
43010035	Ta Nau Kôranh Brah Ngơi mâu geh ôh ndơ nguai dơi jut dơi rgâl. Lah ndri lah Kôranh Brah kuăl bunuyh i nây ‘Brah’ tâm ban ma Păng nơm,
43010036	lah ndri mơm dâng khân may lah Gâp ƀêng ma ngơi mưch Kôranh Brah, ach ma Gâp mbơh săk Gâp nơm: ‘Gâp dja Kon Kôranh Brah’? Yorlah Gâp i dja lĕ Kôranh Brah de kơih njuăl văch ta neh ntu dja.
43010037	Lah ndơ Gâp jan mâu ôh di tă bơh Bơ̆ Gâp, lơi ôh khân may nsing ma Gâp.
43010038	Yơn ma lah ndơ Gâp jan tă bơh Bơ̆ Gâp ngăn, ăn khân may nsing ma Gâp hŏm yor ma ndơ Gâp jan i nây, bol lah khân may mâu nsing ma nau Gâp ngơi kađôi. Ndri dâng khân may gĭt vât n'hêl Bơ̆ Gâp nơm gŭ ndrel ta Gâp, jêh ri Gâp gŭ ndrel ta Bơ̆ Gâp.”
43010039	Bu gay ma ŭch nhŭp tay Brah Yêsu du tơ̆ jât, yơn ma Păng du lôh bơh ti mpôl kôranh phung Israel nây.
43010040	Jêh ri Păng hăn tay kăl ti dak rlai Yôrđăn ri jât, ntŭk Yôhan-Ƀaptem vay gŭ jan ƀăptem yŭk ma dak ăn bu nơh, Păng gŭ ta ntŭk nây.
43010041	Geh bunuyh ŏk ngăn văch ran ta Păng, khân păng tâm lah ndrăng khân păng: “Yôhan-Ƀaptem mâu ôh prot jan nau khlay, yơn ma dâng lĕ nau Yôhan-Ƀaptem mbơh nkoch ma Bunuyh i dja, di dadê ngăn.”
43010042	Ta ntŭk nây geh ŏk bunuyh nsing ma Brah Yêsu.
43011001	Geh du huê bu klô rnha Lasar geh nau ji, păng gŭ ta ƀon Ƀêthani, ndrel ma yôh păng bar hê, rnha Mari, ndrel ma Matha.
43011002	Mari i nây i lĕ tŏ dak ngi ƀô kah ta jŏng Brah Yêsu, jêh ri jut jŏng Brah Yêsu ma sŏk păng nơm nơh.
43011003	Jêh ri bar hê oh nur i nây đă bu hăn mbơh ma Brah Yêsu: “Hơi Kôranh, bunuyh i May rŏng geh nau ji hô ngăn mê.”
43011004	Tât Brah Yêsu tăng nau i nây, Păng lah: “Nau ji i dja mâu ir ôh tât khât, nau ji i dja gay ma geh lư nau chrêk lơp Kôranh Brah, jêh ri geh lư nau chrêk lơp Gâp i Kon Păng đŏng.”
43011005	Brah Yêsu rŏng ma Matha, ma Mari, nđâp ma Lasar đŏng.
43011006	Yơn ma jêh Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt Lasar geh nau ji, Păng hôm gŭ ta ntŭk nây bar nar jât.
43011007	Tât bơh kơi nây, Păng lah ma mpôl oh mon Păng: “Hô̆ bân plơ̆ tay ta bri Yuđa jât.”
43011008	Mpôl oh mon Păng lah ma Păng: “Ơ Nơm Nti, mpôl kôranh phung Israel ta bri Yuđa ŭch klŭp nkhât May ma lŭ mhe a pơ dơm, lah ndri May ŭch plơ̆ tay ta nây ngăn ƀah?”
43011009	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Nar geh 12 mong. Lah bu moh hăn ta nôk nar păng mâu ôh geh chêh jŏng, yorlah păng say nau ang geh ta neh ntu dja.
43011010	Yơn ma bu moh hăn ta nôk măng, păng chêh jŏng ro, yorlah păng mâu say nau ang.”
43011011	Jêh Brah Yêsu lah kơt nây, Păng lah tay ma khân păng: “Mât jăng bân Lasar lĕ hăk bêch hơi, yơn ma Gâp hăn gay ŭch rlay păng.”
43011012	Mpôl oh mon lah ma Păng: “Ơ Kôranh, lah păng lĕ hăk bêch, tay păng bah.”
43011013	Khân păng nđôn lah Brah Yêsu lah Lasar hăk bêch ngăn dơm, yơn ma nau Brah Yêsu ngơi i nây, Păng ŭch lah Lasar lĕ khât ngăn.
43011014	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu mbơh nkoch ma khân păng ăn gĭt n'hêl nanê̆: “Lasar lĕ khât ngăn.
43011015	Gâp răm maak ngăn Gâp mâu geh gŭ ta ri, yorlah geh nau khlay ma khân may, ăn khân may nsing lơ ma hô. Hô̆ bân hăn ta jay păng aƀaơ dja hŏm.”
43011016	Nôk nây geh du huê oh mon rnha Thômas i bu kuăl Điđim đŏng, păng lah ma mpôl oh mon: “Hô̆ bân hăn ndrel Păng, gay ma khât ndrel Păng đŏng!”
43011017	Brah Yêsu hăn tât ta nây, bu mbơh ma Păng lah Lasar lĕ bu tŏp ta môch lĕ geh puăn nar.
43011018	Ƀon Ƀêthani đah ƀon kuŏng Yêrusalem tâm dăch, klăp lah geh pe kilômet dơm.
43011019	Ndri geh ŏk phung Israel tă bơh ƀon Yêrusalem hăn ryôk n'hanh Matha, Mari yor ma i oh khân păng.
43011020	Nôk Matha lĕ gĭt lah Brah Yêsu bơi tât ta nây, păng hăn chuă Brah Yêsu ro, yơn ma Mari hôm gŭ ta jay.
43011021	Matha lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, lah May gŭ ta dja nơh, oh gâp mâu khât ôh.
43011022	Yơn ma gâp gĭt, bol lah aƀaơ dja kađôi đŏng, moh ndơ May dăn tă bơh Kôranh Brah, Păng ăn ma May ro.”
43011023	Brah Yêsu lah ma păng: “Oh ay mra dâk rêh.”
43011024	Matha lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ, gâp gĭt păng mra dâk rêh tay, păng dâk rêh ta nar n'glĕ dŭt, tât dâng lĕ bunuyh khât dâk rêh tay.”
43011025	Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp dja i tơm jan ăn bunuyh dâk rêh, ndrel ma tơm nau rêh, bu moh nsing ma Gâp, bol lah khât kađôi păng mra hôm rêh.
43011026	Jêh ri bu moh hôm gŭ rêh nsing ma Gâp mâu geh khât ôh, ay iăt đŏng nau i nây?”
43011027	Matha lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, lĕ gâp iăt May Brah Krist i Nơm Rklaih i Kôranh Brah lĕ ton njuăl ta neh ntu dja. May Kon Kôranh Brah nơm.”
43011028	Jêh Matha ngơi kơt nây, jêh ri păng hăn kuăl oh păng Mari mâu ăn bu gĭt, păng lah: “Nơm Nti lĕ tât, Păng kuăl ay.”
43011029	Tât Mari gĭt, păng dâk hăn mâp Brah Yêsu ro.
43011030	Brah Yêsu ê hŏ ôh lăp trôm ƀon, Păng hôm gŭ ta ntŭk Matha hăn mâp ri nơh.
43011031	Phung Israel i gŭ ryôk n'hanh Mari ta jay nây, say păng dâk hăn ndal nây, khân păng leo băl hăn tâng păng, nđôn lah păng hăn nhŭm vơl oh păng a môch.
43011032	Mari hăn jât ntŭk Brah Yêsu gŭ, tât păng say Brah Yêsu păng păn ta jŏng Brah Yêsu nây lah: “Ơ Kôranh, lah May gŭ ta dja nơh, oh gâp mâu ôh khât.”
43011033	Brah Yêsu say Mari, ndrel ma phung Israel hăn tâng păng nhŭm vơl dadê, Brah Yêsu rngot ŭk rŭl ta nuih n'hâm dŭt hô.
43011034	Păng ôp: “Ah ntŭk khân ay tŏp păng?” Khân păng ơh: “Ơ Kôranh, dăn May hăn tâng hên.”
43011035	Nôk nây Brah Yêsu nhŭm.
43011036	Phung Israel tâm lah: “Uănh! Păng rŏng hô ngăn ma Lasar.”
43011037	Ta phung khân păng aƀă lah: “Păng i nây ƀah, bunuyh cheh măt lĕ jan ăn say ang. Lah ndri mơm dâng Păng mâu ôh buay Lasar dja mâu ăn khât nơh?”
43011038	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu hăn ta môch, ta nuih n'hâm Păng geh nau ŭk rŭl tay du tơ̆ jât. Môch i nây trôm klêr ta yôk, i trôm nây bu rdŏl ma lŭ kuŏng.
43011039	Tât ta môch Brah Yêsu lah: “Rlă lơi lŭ i nây.” Matha i yôh bunuyh khât nây lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, bunuyh dja lĕ ƀô ôm, yorlah lĕ puăn nar tŏp păng ta dja.”
43011040	Brah Yêsu lah ma păng: “Gâp lĕ mbơh nkoch ma ay ƀah, lah ay nsing, ay say nau chrêk lơp Kôranh Brah ngăn ro?”
43011041	Jêh ri bu rlă lơi lŭ bơh bŏr ntu i nây. Brah Yêsu n'gơr măt jât trôk ti lah: “Ơ Bơ̆, Gâp lah ueh ma May ngăn, yor ma May lĕ iăt Gâp.
43011042	Gâp lĕ gĭt ngăn May iăt Gâp mro mrăng, dâng Gâp ngơi nteh kơt nđa, yorlah geh ŏk bunuyh gŭ jŭm Gâp ta dja. Gâp ŭch khân păng iăt May Nơm i tơm njuăl Gâp.”
43011043	Jêh Brah Yêsu lah kơt nây, Păng nter dŭt huy: “Ơ Lasar! May lôh hŏm!”
43011044	Jêh ri Lasar lôh bơh ri jŏng ti hôm put ma bok, muh măt hôm put ma bok đŏng. Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Sơm drih lơi bok păng nây, ăn păng hăn.”
43011045	Phung Israel i hăn ta jay Mari nây, say Brah Yêsu jan nau khlay nây, ŏk ngăn bu nsing ma Păng.
43011046	Yơn ma geh bunuyh aƀă ta phung khân păng i nây, hăn mbơh nkoch ăn ma phung Pharisi ndơ i Brah Yêsu jan nây.
43011047	Jêh ri mpôl kôranh jan brah, ndrel ma phung Pharisi rgum mpôl kôranh jan kar bri Yuđa tâm nchră nau: “Aƀaơ dja mơm bân jan ma Bunuyh i nây? Yorlah Păng jan nau khlay ŏk ngăn.
43011048	Lah bân rong Păng kơt nây, dâng lĕ phung ƀon lan nsing ma Păng dadê, jêh ri phung tahen Rôm hăn lơh hêng nhih jan brah ma Kôranh Brah, nđâp ma bri dak bân ro.”
43011049	Geh du huê bunuyh ta mpôl khân păng rnha Kaiphas, păng jêng kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng ta năm nây, păng lah: “Dâng lĕ khân may nây mâu ôh gĭt vât du ntil nau!
43011050	Lŏng khân may mân heh! Ueh rlau ma khân may geh khât du huê bunuyh ăn ma dâng lĕ phung ƀon lan, đah ma roh hêng dâng lĕ bri dak bân.”
43011051	Nau păng ngơi kơt nây mâu geh ôh tâng nau ŭch êng săk păng nơm. Păng jêng kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng ta năm nây, kơt ndri dâng Kôranh Brah ăn păng nkoch lor lah, Brah Yêsu khât ntrŏ dâng lĕ phung Israel.
43011052	Mâu ôh khât ăn ma dâng lĕ phung Israel dơm, yơn ma khât ăn ma dâng lĕ phung kon Kôranh Brah gŭ chah chrai băl lam neh ntu, gay ma rgum jêng du phung dơm hŏ.
43011053	Ntơm bơh nar nây, mpôl kôranh phung Israel, khân păng tâm nchră băl gay ma ŭch nkhât lơi Brah Yêsu.
43011054	Ach ma kơt ndri dâng Brah Yêsu mâu hôm brô̆ nsong ăn mpôl kôranh phung Israel say. Păng du bơh ntŭk nây hăn ta ƀon dăch kêng bri rdah, ƀon nây rnha ƀon Êpraim, Păng gŭ ta ƀon nây ndrel mpôl oh mon Păng.
43011055	Nôk nây nar nhêt ƀŭn n'hot lĕ bơi ma tât đŏng, geh ŏk phung Israel tă bơh lam bri hăn ta ƀon kuŏng Yêrusalem, gay ma jan rao săk ăn kloh tâng nau vay phung Israel ê lor ma nhêt ƀŭn n'hot i nây.
43011056	Nôk nây bu joi Brah Yêsu, jêh ri gŭ ta jŏng gung nhih jan brah nây, khân păng tâm lah ndrăng khân păng: “Mâu say ôh Păng, mơm khân ay may mân, gĭt lah Păng mâu bănh hăn ta dja ro?”
43011057	Lŏng mpôl kôranh jan brah, ndrel ma phung Pharisi, mbơh nau ma bu, lah bu moh gĭt ntŭk Brah Yêsu gŭ, đă mbơh nkoch ma khân păng, gay ma khân păng hăn nhŭp.
43012001	Hôm e prao nar ma tât di nar nhêt ƀŭn n'hot, Brah Yêsu hăn tât ta ƀon Ƀêthani, ntŭk ƀon Lasar gŭ, bunuyh i Brah Yêsu de jan ăn dâk rêh nơh.
43012002	Ta ntŭk nây bu ndrăp ndơ sông sa kuŏng ăn ma Brah Yêsu. Matha kơl ăn ndơ sông sa ma bu, Lasar gŭ sông sa ndrel Brah Yêsu ta nsưng nây. Nôk nây tâng ma nau vay nôk sông sa kuŏng, khân păng sông sa gŭ bêch nkêng jât chiao, i jŏng rok jât kơi.
43012003	Jêh ri Mari sŏ dak ngi ƀô kah i khlay ngăn ntil dŭt ueh i bu kuăl lah dak ngi ‘Nartu’ n'gul lit, tŏ ta jŏng Brah Yêsu nây, jêh ri jut jŏng Brah Yêsu i nây ma sŏk păng nơm, n'hôl ƀô kah bêng jay nây ngăn.
43012004	Geh du huê bunuyh ta mpôl oh mon Brah Yêsu, rnha Yuđas-Isakariyôt, jât năp tay păng i nây leo bu hăn nhŭp Brah Yêsu, păng lah:
43012005	“Moh kô̆ mâu tăch dak ngi ƀô kah i khlay ngăn nây 300 prăk kăk, pă ăn ma bunuyh o ach?”
43012006	Yuđas-Isakariyôt ngơi kơt nây păng mâu ôh yô̆ ma phung o ach ngăn. Păng bunuyh ntŭng, păng bunuyh ndjôt dŭng prăk mpôl oh mon, nđâp ma păng nơh lĕ vay tă sŏ prăk aƀă bơh dŭng i nây dah păng nơm ŭch dŏng.
43012007	Yơn ma Brah Yêsu lah: “Ăn dah ma jan pre hŏ, păng tŏ dak ngi ƀô kah dja, gay ma ndrăp săk Gâp ma tŏp.
43012008	Khân ay may hôm e geh bunuyh o ach gŭ ndrel khân ay may mro, yơn ma Gâp dja, Gâp mâu hôm ôh gŭ mro ndrel khân ay may.”
43012009	Ŏk ngăn phung Israel gĭt lah Brah Yêsu gŭ ta nây, jêh ri khân păng hăn ta Păng, mâu ôh dơn ŭch say Brah Yêsu dơm, khân păng ŭch say Lasar i lĕ Brah Yêsu jan ăn dâk rêh bơh phung khât nây đŏng.
43012010	Ndri dâng mpôl kôranh jan brah, khân păng tâm nchră băl ŭch nkhât lơi Lasar đŏng,
43012011	ach ma bu lĕ gĭt Lasar lĕ dâk rêh, dâng ŏk phung Israel du lôh bơh khân păng, jêh ri nsing ma Brah Yêsu.
43012012	Bunuyh i hăn ta ƀon kuŏng Yêrusalem nhêt ƀŭn n'hot ŏk ngăn. Tât nar ôi tay jêh nau sông sa kuŏng i nây, khân păng tăng lah Brah Yêsu brô̆ lĕ bơi ma tât ta ƀon Yêrusalem.
43012013	Khân păng leo băl sreh n'ha jôm lôh bơh ƀon hăn chuă Brah Yêsu, nđâp ma nter lah: “Rnê ma Kôranh Brah! Dăn Kôranh Brah ăn nau geh jêng ma Păng i Kôranh Brah de đă văch, Păng kađăch phung Israel”.
43012014	Brah Yêsu lĕ say du mlŏm kon seh lia, Păng ncho ta kalơ ri, i nây jêng tâm di ma nau lĕ bu nchih lah:
43012015	‘Ơ phung ƀon lan ta ƀon Yêrusalem i bu kuăl kon bu ur Siôn đŏng, khân ay may lơi klach ôh. Uănh ri! Kađăch khân ay may bơi ma tât Păng gŭ ncho ta kalơ kon seh lia’.
43012016	Bơh ntơm nơh, mpôl oh mon Brah Yêsu ê vât ôh nau i nây. Jêh Brah Yêsu dâk rêh lăp ta nau chrêk lơp Păng nơm, ri mơ khân păng kah gĭt nau bu lĕ nchih ma Păng kăl e nơh, dâng lĕ nau i nây geh ma Păng jêng tâm di.
43012017	Phung ƀon lan i gŭ ndrel Brah Yêsu, nôk Păng kuăl Lasar lôh bơh ntu môch, nđâp ma jan ăn păng dâk rêh nơh, khân păng mbơh nkoch nâng dâng lĕ nau khlay i nây i Brah Yêsu de jan.
43012018	Phung ƀon lan ŏk ngăn hăn ran chuă ta Păng, yorlah tăng bu nkoch Păng jan nau khlay ăn Lasar dâk rêh i nây.
43012019	Phung Pharisi tâm lah ndrăng khân păng: “Say ƀah! Bân mâu ôh dơi buay Păng! Dâng lĕ phung ƀon lan lĕ tâng Păng dadê!”
43012020	Ta nklang phung bunuyh hăn ta ƀon Yêrusalem yơk mbah ma Kôranh Brah ta nar nhêt ƀŭn n'hot nây, ta nây geh phung Grek aƀă đŏng i mâu di phung Israel hăn lăp ndrel.
43012021	Khân păng hăn ta Philip du huê mpôl kôranh oh mon bunuyh tă bơh ƀon Ƀêtsaida bri Galilê, khân păng lah: “Ơ kôranh, hên ŭch mâp Kôranh Yêsu.”
43012022	Philip hăn mâp mbơh ma Ŏndrê, jêh ri Ŏndrê, ndrel ma Philip hăn ôp Brah Yêsu.
43012023	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Nar Gâp i Kon Bunuyh tă bơh Kôranh Brah de njuăl lăp ta nau chrêk lơp Gâp nơm lĕ tât jêh.
43012024	Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, lah du găr ba lah ba i nây bu mâu tuch ta neh, ba i nây hôm du găr nâng dơm, yơn ma lah tuch ta neh păng mâu ôh hôm kơt ơm, lôh jêng tơm ba i lĕ hon, jêh ri geh play ŏk ngăn. Kơt ndri đŏng yor ma Gâp khât dâng geh ŏk bunuyh sŏ dơn nau rêh mhe.
43012025	Bu moh ŭch ngăn pơh ma nau rêh păng nơm dơm ta neh ntu dja, păng i nây mâu ôh geh nau rêh n'ho ro, yơn ma bu moh mâu ôh kơp khlay ma nau rêh păng nơm ta neh ntu dja, păng i nây hôm geh nau rêh n'ho ro ngăn ma păng nơm.
43012026	Bu moh sơm kơl jan kar ma Gâp, iăt ma păng tâng Gâp, jêh ri ah ntŭk Gâp gŭ, păng Gŭ ta ntŭk nây đŏng. Bu moh sơm kơl jan kar ma Gâp, Bơ̆ Gâp rnê đŏng ma păng.”
43012027	“Aƀaơ dja nuih n'hâm Gâp geh nau rŭng răng ngăn. A mơm Gâp ngơi aƀaơ dja? Ngơi: ‘Ơ Bơ̆, dăn May rklaih Gâp bơh nau jêr i dja’, bơh? Mâu ôh. Yor ma nau i dja ro dâng Gâp văch ta neh ntu dja.
43012028	Ơ Bơ̆, đă May jan ăn May nơm geh nau chrêk lơp.” Nôk nây geh tăng nteh bŏr tă bơh kalơ trôk ti: “Gâp lĕ jan ăn Gâp nơm geh nau chrêk lơp, jêh ri Gâp mra jan du tơ̆ đŏng jât.”
43012029	Phung ƀon lan gŭ ta nây tăng nteh, khân păng tâm lah: “Gĭt nteh ntŏr nglayh?” Aƀă jât lah: “Gĭt geh tông păr ngơi ma Păng?”
43012030	Brah Yêsu lah: “Nteh i nây gay ma geh nau khlay ma khân ay may, mâu di ôh gay ma geh nau khlay ma Gâp.
43012031	Aƀaơ dja nar phat dôih dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja lĕ tât jêh, aƀaơ dja lĕ tât đŏng nar mprơh lơi Satăng i kôranh mpôl brah djơh i nơm kôranh ma neh ntu dja.
43012032	Yơn ma Gâp, tât bu n'hao Gâp bơh neh dja, Gâp leo dâng lĕ bunuyh hăn ta Gâp dadê.”
43012033	Brah Yêsu ngơi kơt nây, ŭch ăn bu gĭt mơm nau Păng khât, yorlah ta si tâm rkăng bu n'hao Păng bơh neh.
43012034	Phung ƀon lan ôp Brah Yêsu: “Hên lĕ tăng ta nau vay phung bân lah: ‘Brah Krist hôm gŭ n'ho ro’. Lah ndri mơm dâng May lah Kon Bunuyh i tă bơh Kôranh Brah de njuăl bu de nkhât n'hao Păng bơh neh ntu dja? Lah ndri bu moh Kon Bunuyh i nây?”
43012035	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Nau Ang hôm gŭ ndrel khân ay may du ƀlât dơm. Ăn khân ay may hăn hŏm dôl Nau Ang hôm e gŭ ndrel khân ay may, gay ma nau ngo mâu dơi đah khân ay may. Lah bu moh hăn ta nau ngo, păng mâu gĭt ôh ah ntŭk păng hăn.
43012036	Dôl hôm geh Nau Ang dja, ăn khân ay may nsing hŏm ma Nau Ang i nây, gay ma khân ay may jêng kon Nau Ang.” Jêh Brah Yêsu ngơi kơt nây, jêh ri Păng du krap, bu mâu hôm ôh say Păng.
43012037	Bol lah phung ƀon lan lĕ say Brah Yêsu jan ŏk nau khlay kađôi, hôm e geh ŏk bunuyh mâu nsing ma Păng đŏng.
43012038	Nau nây jêng tâm di đah nau Êsai i bunuyh ntơyh nau ngơi Kôranh Brah kăl e nơh lĕ nchih: ‘Ơ Kôranh Brah, bu moh ma iăt nau hên lĕ mbơh nkoch? Bu moh ma say nau dơi May lĕ nhhơ?’
43012039	Ach ma kơt nđa dâng bu mâu nsing, kơt Êsai nchih tay jât:
43012040	‘Kôranh Brah jan ăn trôm măt khân păng cheh, Nuih n'hâm khân păng dăng ko, Gay ma trôm măt khân păng mâu say ngăn, Nđâp ma nuih n'hâm khân păng mâu gĭt vât, Ndri khân păng mâu plơ̆ sât ma Kôranh Brah, Jêh ri Kôranh Brah mâu ôh jan bah khân păng’.
43012041	Êsai ngơi kơt nây, yorlah kăl e nơh păng lĕ say nau chrêk lơp Brah Yêsu, jêh ri păng mbơh nkoch lor ma Brah Yêsu.
43012042	Yơn ma hôm geh ŏk bunuyh nsing ma Brah Yêsu, geh mpôl kôranh ta phung Israel nsing ma Păng đŏng. Yơn ma khân păng mâu bănh mbơh nkoch nau nsing i nây ma bu, yor ma khân păng klach phung Pharisi mprơh khân păng du bơh nhih rƀŭn phung khân păng nơm.
43012043	Khân păng jan kơt nây, yor ma khân păng ŭch bunuyh rnê rlau ma Kôranh Brah rnê.
43012044	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu ngơi dŭt nteh: “Bu moh nsing ma Gâp, mâu ôh dơn nsing ma Gâp dơm, păng nsing đŏng ma Kôranh Brah nơm tơm njuăl Gâp.
43012045	Bu moh say Gâp, păng say đŏng i Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp.
43012046	Gâp văch ta neh ntu dja tâm ban ma nau ang, gay ma bu moh nsing ma Gâp, păng mâu ôh hôm tâm ban ma bunuyh gŭ ta nau ngo.
43012047	Lah bu moh tăng bŏr Gâp ngơi, tih ma mâu ŭch iăt nau Gâp nti, Gâp mâu ôh phat dôih aƀaơ dja, yorlah Gâp văch mâu ôh gay ma phat dôih bunuyh ta neh ntu dja, Gâp văch gay ma rklaih bunuyh ta neh ntu dja.
43012048	Yơn ma bu moh rlăch mâu ôh iăt nau Gâp, mâu ôh sŏ dơn nau Gâp nti lah, păng i nây lĕ geh kôranh phat dôih păng. Nau Gâp lĕ nti lah i nây mra phat dôih păng ta nar n'glĕ dŭt tay,
43012049	yorlah nau Gâp nti lah i nây, mâu geh ôh lôh tă bơh săk Gâp nơm ŭch, yơn ma Bơ̆ Gâp nơm tơm njuăl Gâp đă ma Gâp, moh nau Gâp nti, moh nau Gâp lah.
43012050	Jêh ri Gâp lĕ gĭt, nau Kôranh Brah đă ăn geh nau rêh n'ho ro. Lah ndri dâng lĕ nau Gâp lah, Gâp lah kơt nau Bơ̆ Gâp lĕ đă.”
43013001	Ê lor ma lăp nhêt ƀŭn n'hot, Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt nar Păng lôh bơh neh ntu dja hăn sât ta Bơ̆ Păng nơm lĕ di mong. Brah Yêsu rŏng ma mpôl oh mon Păng nơm ta neh ntu dja, Păng hôm rŏng ma khân păng mro mrăng tât lôch.
43013002	Tât mong sông sa a măng, Satăng lĕ jan ăn Yuđas-Isakariyôt i kon Simôn geh nau mân leo bu hăn nhŭp Brah Yêsu.
43013003	Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt jêh, dâng lĕ ndơ Bơ̆ Păng lĕ ăn nau dơi ma Păng dadê, Păng lĕ gĭt đŏng, Păng nơh văch tă bơh Kôranh Brah, jêh ri plơ̆ sât tay ta Kôranh Brah đŏng.
43013004	Kơt ndri dâng Păng dâk bơh ntŭk sông, drih ao kuŏng Păng nơm, sŏ bok kât ta bŭt.
43013005	Păng sŏ dak nkhŭt ta ngan grưng, jêh ri Păng rao jŏng mpôl oh mon Păng du huê du huê, Păng sŏ bok kât ta bŭt, sơm jut jŏng khân păng đŏng.
43013006	Tât ta Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng nây, păng ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, ah May ŭch sơm rao jŏng gâp bơh?”
43013007	Brah Yêsu ơh ma păng: “Aƀaơ dja may ê hŏ vât ôh ndơ Gâp jan dja. Nar jât năp tay may vât ro.”
43013008	Pêtrôs lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, lơi ôh May sơm rao jŏng gâp!” Brah Yêsu ơh: “Lah Gâp mâu rao jŏng may, may mâu ôh jêng oh mon Gâp.”
43013009	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng lah: “Ơ Kôranh, lah ndri May lơi ôh dơn rao jŏng dơm, dăn May rao lĕ ma ti ma bôk gâp đŏng.”
43013010	Brah Yêsu lah: “Bunuyh lĕ jêh ŭm, rao jŏng găp hơyh, yorlah săk jăn păng lĕ kloh. Mpôl khân may lĕ kloh, yơn ma mâu geh ôh geh dâng lĕ khân may.”
43013011	Brah Yêsu ngơi kơt nây, yorlah Păng lĕ gĭt bu moh ŭch leo bu hăn nhŭp Păng. Kơt ndri dâng Păng lah: “Dâng lĕ khân may mâu geh ôh kloh dadê.”
43013012	Jêh phiao Brah Yêsu rao jŏng mpôl oh mon Păng, Păng nsoh bok ao Păng nơm, gŭ tay ta ntŭk sông sa, jêh ri ôp khân păng: “Khân may vât đŏng, ndơ Gâp sơm jan ăn ma khân may nây nơh?
43013013	Khân may kuăl Gâp ‘Nơm Nti’, kuăl Gâp ‘Kôranh’. Di ngăn nau khân may kuăl nây, yorlah Gâp Nơm Nti, Gâp Kôranh ngăn.
43013014	Lah Gâp dja lĕ Nơm Nti khân may, lĕ Kôranh khân may, jêh ri nkhơng ma sơm rao rlơ̆ jŏng khân may, lah ndri ăn khân may sơm rao jŏng ndrăng khân may nơm đŏng.
43013015	Dja Gâp jan leo trong ăn ma khân may, lah ndri ăn khân may jan kơt Gâp lĕ jan ma khân may nây.
43013016	Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, bunuyh sơm kơl jan kar mâu ôh kuŏng rlau ma kôranh păng, bunuyh ntơyh nau mâu đŏng kuŏng rlau ma nơm đă păng hăn.”
43013017	“Lah khân may gĭt vât nau i nây, jêh ri jan tâng kơt, Kôranh Brah ăn nau geh jêng ueh ngăn ma khân may.
43013018	Gâp ngơi kơt nđay, mâu ôh ngơi ăn ma dâng lĕ khân may, yorlah Gâp lĕ gĭt bu moh Gâp kơih. Yơn ma iăt ma geh tâm di ma Nau Kôranh Brah Ngơi lĕ nchih lah: ‘Du huê bunuyh gŭ sông sa ndrel Gâp, tih ma păng jan djơh ma Gâp’.
43013019	Gâp mbơh nau i nây ma khân may ê lor ma tât, gay ma nôk tât nau i nây tay, khân may iăt ro Gâp Brah Krist i Nơm Rklaih tă bơh Kôranh Brah de njuăl ngăn.
43013020	Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may: Bu moh rom du huê bunuyh Gâp đă hăn, jêng păng rom Gâp đŏng, jêh ri bu moh rom Gâp, jêng păng rom i Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp đŏng.”
43013021	Jêh Brah Yêsu ngơi nau nây, ta nuih n'hâm Păng ri geh nau rvê rŭng răng ngăn, jêh ri Păng lah: “Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, geh du huê ta mpôl khân may ta oi tay leo bu hăn nhŭp Gâp.”
43013022	Mpôl oh mon tâm uănh măt ndrăng khân păng nơm, yorlah khân păng mâu gĭt ôh bu moh Brah Yêsu ŭch lah i nây.
43013023	Ta nây geh du huê oh mon i Brah Yêsu de rŏng, păng gŭ dăch kêng Brah Yêsu.
43013024	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng nchŏng ma ti ăn oh mon i nây gĭt vât, gay ma đă păng ôp Brah Yêsu bu moh bunuyh Păng ŭch lah i nây.
43013025	Jêh ri oh mon i nây n'gâl măt jât Brah Yêsu nây, ôp Păng: “Ơ Kôranh, bu moh i ri mêh?”
43013026	Brah Yêsu ơh: “Bu moh Gâp ndơ̆ nŭmpăng Gâp yŭk dja, păng i nây ro.” Jêh ri Brah Yêsu yŭk nŭmpăng ta ngan ndơ̆ ăn Yuđas-Isakariyôt i kon Simôn.
43013027	Jêh Yuđas-Isakariyôt sŏ nŭmpăng i nây, Satăng lăp gŭ ta săk păng ro. Jêh ri Brah Yêsu lah ma păng: “Moh ndơ i may ŭch jan, ăn may jan gơnh hŏm.”
43013028	Dâng lĕ mpôl gŭ sông sa ta nsưng nây, mâu geh ôh du huê bunuyh gĭt moh geh nau khlay nau Brah Yêsu lah i nây.
43013029	Bunuyh aƀă nđôn lah Brah Yêsu ŭch đă Yuđas-Isakariyôt hăn rvăt ndơ ma dŏng nar nhêt ƀŭn, mâu lah ŭch đă păng hăn pă ndơ ăn ma phung o ach, ach ma Yuđas-Isakariyôt jêng bunuyh ndjôt dŭng prăk mpôl khân păng nây.
43013030	Jêh Yuđas-Isakariyôt dơn nŭmpăng i nây, jêh ri păng hăn ro, nôk nây bri lĕ ngo.
43013031	Ndŭt Yuđas-Isakariyôt hăn, Brah Yêsu lah: “Aƀaơ dja lĕ tât di mong Gâp i Kon Bunuyh tă bơh Kôranh Brah lăp ta nau chrêk lơp Gâp nơm, jêh ri Kôranh Brah geh nau chrêk lơp yor ma Gâp đŏng.
43013032	Jêh ri lah Kôranh Brah geh nau chrêk lơp yor ma Gâp, hôm du ƀlât jât Păng ŭch ăn nau chrêk lơp ma Gâp.
43013033	Ơ mpôl kon Gâp, Gâp hôm gŭ ndrel khân may du ƀlât dơm, jêh ri tay khân may tâng joi Gâp. Aƀaơ dja Gâp ŭch mbơh ma khân may kơt Gâp lĕ mbơh ma mpôl kôranh phung Israel nơh đŏng: ‘Ntŭk Gâp hăn, khân may mâu ôh dơi hăn’.
43013034	Gâp ăn du nau đă mhe ma khân may: Đă khân may tâm rŏng ndrăng khân may nơm. Tâm ban ma Gâp lĕ rŏng ma khân may, ăn khân may tâm rŏng ndrăng khân may nơm.
43013035	Yor ma khân may tâm rŏng ndrăng khân may nơm, dâng lĕ bunuyh bu gĭt lah khân may oh mon Gâp ngăn.”
43013036	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, ah ntŭk hăn May ri?” Brah Yêsu ơh: “Ntŭk Gâp hăn i nây, aƀaơ dja may mâu ôh dơi hăn. Nar jât năp tay may mra hăn tâng Gâp ta nây.”
43013037	Pêtrôs ôp tay Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, moh kô̆ gâp mâu dơi tâng May aƀaơ dja? Gâp ŭch ƀŏng săk gâp nơm khât ma May.”
43013038	Brah Yêsu lah ma păng: “May ŭch ƀŏng săk may nơm khât ma Gâp ngăn ƀah? Yơn ma Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma may, ta măng dja iăr ê hŏ ôh ndrau, may lĕ rlăch pe tơ̆ lah mâu gĭt năl Gâp.”
43014001	“Nuih n'hâm khân may lơi ôh rvê rŭng răng, ăn khân may nsing ma Kôranh Brah, ăn khân may nsing ma Gâp đŏng.
43014002	Ta nhih Bơ̆ Gâp geh ŏk ngăn ntŭk gŭ, lah mâu geh mơm dâng Gâp mbơh ma khân may: ‘Gâp hăn ndrăp ntŭk ăn ma khân may’?
43014003	Jêh Gâp ndrăp ntŭk ăn ma khân may, Gâp mra plơ̆ sŏ khân may đŏng, gay ma ăn khân may gŭ ndrel Gâp.
43014004	Ntŭk Gâp hăn nây khân may lĕ gĭt trong đŏng.”
43014005	Thômas ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, hên mâu gĭt ôh ah ntŭk May hăn, lah ndri mơm dâng hên gĭt trong May hăn?”
43014006	Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp dja jêng tâm ban ma trong i hăn tât ta bơ̆ nơm, mâu hôm ôh geh trong êng, Gâp dja jêng nau ngăn, Gâp dja jêng nau rêh. Rlao bơh Gâp, mâu ôh hôm geh trong a êng jât hăn tât ta Bơ̆ Gâp.
43014007	Lah khân may lĕ gĭt năl Gâp, khân may gĭt năl Bơ̆ Gâp đŏng. Ntơm bơh aƀaơ dja khân may gĭt năl Păng, ndrel ma lĕ say Păng đŏng.”
43014008	Philip lah ma Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, dăn May nhhơ ăn hên say Bơ̆ May, lĕ găp jêh.”
43014009	Brah Yêsu ơh ma păng: “Ơ Philip, Gâp gŭ ndrel khân may lĕ jŏ ngăn, mơm dâng may hôm e ê hŏ năl Gâp? Bu moh lĕ say Gâp, păng lĕ say Bơ̆ Gâp đŏng. Mơm dâng may lah: ‘Dăn May nhhơ ăn hên say Bơ̆ May’ kơt nây?
43014010	May mâu iăt ƀah, Gâp gŭ ta Bơ̆ Gâp, Bơ̆ Gâp gŭ ta Gâp? Dâng lĕ nau Gâp mbơh nkoch ma khân may, mâu ôh lôh tă bơh săk Gâp nơm ŭch, Bơ̆ Gâp gŭ ta Gâp, Păng nơm jan dâng lĕ nau Păng nơm i nây.
43014011	Ăn khân may iăt Gâp hŏm, Gâp gŭ ta Bơ̆ Gâp, Bơ̆ Gâp gŭ ta Gâp. Lah khân may mâu iăt ôh Gâp yor ma nau Gâp ngơi dơm, ăn khân may iăt Gâp yor ma ndơ khlay Gâp jan nơh.
43014012	Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, bu moh nsing ma Gâp, moh kar Gâp jan, păng jan đŏng, jêh ri păng jan kar kuŏng rlau i nây jât, yorlah Gâp sât ta Bơ̆ Gâp.
43014013	Jêh ri moh ndơ khân may dăn ta rnha săk Gâp, Gâp jan ro, gay ma Gâp i Kon ăn nau chrêk lơp ma Bơ̆ Gâp lơ ma hô.
43014014	Moh ndơ khân may dăn ta rnha săk Gâp, Gâp jan ro.”
43014015	“Lah khân may rŏng ma Gâp, khân may ndjôt nau Gâp đă.
43014016	Jêh ri tay Gâp dăn ma Bơ̆, jêh Gâp dăn nây Păng ăn ma khân may du huê Nơm kơl a êng gŭ ndrel khân may n'ho ro.
43014017	Păng i nây Brah Huêng Ueh, Păng leo khân may ta nau nti ngăn. Bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp mâu ôh vơt dơn Păng, yorlah khân păng uănh Păng mâu say, ndrel ma mâu gĭt năl Păng đŏng. Yơn ma khân may lĕ gĭt năl Păng, Păng gŭ rêh ndrel khân may, jêh ri mra gŭ ta khân may.
43014018	Gâp mâu ôh ntlơi khân may jêng tâm ban ma kon đơi, Gâp mra plơ̆ ta khân may đŏng.
43014019	Hôm du ƀlât, bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp mâu ôh hôm say Gâp, yơn ma khân may mra say Gâp. Yorlah Gâp rêh, ndri khân may mra rêh đŏng.
43014020	Ta nar nây khân may gĭt Gâp gŭ ta Bơ̆ Gâp, jêh ri khân may gŭ ta Gâp, Gâp gŭ ta khân may đŏng.
43014021	Bu moh sŏ dơn nau Gâp đă, ndrel ma jan tâng kơt, păng i nây rŏng ma Gâp ngăn, Bơ̆ Gâp rŏng ma păng i nây đŏng. Gâp rŏng ma păng i nây, jêh ri Gâp ăn păng i nây gĭt năl Gâp lơ hô jât.”
43014022	Yuđas - mâu ôh di Yuđas-Isakariyôt - păng ôp Brah Yêsu: “Ơ Kôranh, mơm dâng May ăn ma hên dơm gĭt năl May, dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja May mâu ôh ăn năl?”
43014023	Brah Yêsu lah: “Lah bu moh rŏng ma Gâp, păng i nây jan tâng nau Gâp ngơi, Bơ̆ Gâp rŏng ma păng i nây đŏng. Jêh ri Bơ̆ Gâp, ndrel ma Gâp hăn ta păng, n'ho ma gŭ ndrel ta păng.
43014024	Bu moh mâu rŏng ma Gâp, păng i nây mâu ôh jan tâng nau Gâp ngơi. Nau Gâp ngơi, mâu ôh lôh tă bơh săk Gâp nơm, lôh tă bơh Bơ̆ Gâp nơm, Păng i tơm njuăl Gâp dja.”
43014025	“Gâp mbơh nkoch dâng lĕ nau i nây ma khân may dôl Gâp hôm gŭ ndrel khân may ta dja.
43014026	Yơn ma Brah Huêng Ueh i kloh ueh i Nơm kơl bunuyh i nsing nây, Bơ̆ de njuăl ma sơm ntang Gâp, Păng mra ntŭm nti dâng lĕ nau ăn ma khân may, n'ho ma nkah dâng lĕ nau Gâp lĕ mbơh ma khân may nơh, ăn khân may kah gĭt.
43014027	Gâp du lôh bơh khân may, yơn ma Gâp hôm ăn nau đăp mpăn gŭ ta khân may, Gâp ăn nau đăp mpăn Gâp nơm ma khân may. Nau đăp mpăn Gâp ăn i nây, mâu tâm ban ma nau đăp mpăn bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp ăn. Kơt ndri nuih n'hâm khân may lơi ôh rvê rŭng răng lơi ôh klach.
43014028	Khân may lĕ tăng jêh nau Gâp mbơh nkoch ma khân may: ‘Gâp du lôh bơh khân may, jêh ri Gâp plơ̆ tay đŏng ta khân may’. Lah khân may rŏng Gâp, khân may răm maak ngăn gĭt Gâp hăn ta Bơ̆, yorlah Bơ̆ kuŏng rlau Gâp.
43014029	Gâp mbơh nkoch nau i nây ăn ma khân may gĭt lor, ê lor ma tât, gay ma khân may nsing nôk nau i nây tât ri tay.
43014030	Gâp mâu hôm lăng ôh geh mong ma ngơi ndrel khân may, yorlah Satăng i kôranh mpôl brah djơh i jêng kôranh neh ntu dja lĕ bơi ma tât, yơn ma păng mâu ôh geh nau dơi đah Gâp.
43014031	Păng mâu geh nau dơi ma Gâp, jêh ri Gâp hôm jan tâng nau Bơ̆ đă ma Gâp, gay ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja bu gĭt Gâp rŏng ngăn ma Bơ̆. Hô̆ bân dâk hăn hŏm.”
43015001	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp dja jêng tâm ban ma tơm play yŭng yar ƀon i ngăn, jêh ri Bơ̆ Gâp năk tơm mât.
43015002	Moh n'ging hon ta Gâp mâu geh play, Bơ̆ Gâp sreh mƀăr lơi. Yơn ma n'ging geh play, Păng koh đê̆ mât ăn ueh, gay ma play lơ ŏk jât.
43015003	Mpôl khân may lĕ kloh jêh, yor ma nau Gâp lĕ jêh mbơh nkoch ma khân may.
43015004	Ăn khân may hôm gŭ ta Gâp nâng, kơt Gâp hôm gŭ ta khân may nâng. Gâp jêng tâm ban ma tơm, moh n'ging mâu hon bơh Gâp, păng mâu ôh geh play. Khân may tâm ban kơt nây đŏng, lah mâu ôh gŭ nâng ta Gâp, khân may mâu geh play ôh.
43015005	Gâp dja tâm ban ma tơm play yŭng yar ƀon, khân may tâm ban ma n'ging. Bu moh hôm gŭ ta Gâp nâng, Gâp hôm gŭ ta păng nâng, păng i nây geh play ŏk ngăn. Lah khân may gŭ tâm nkhah ma Gâp, khân may mâu blao ôh jan êng du ntil ndơ i geh nau khlay ta Kôranh Brah.
43015006	Bu moh mâu gŭ ta Gâp, păng i nây tâm ban ma n'ging bu mƀăr lơi, tât ndro bu rgum pur lơi ta ŭnh, jêh ri ŭnh sa lĕ phiao.
43015007	Lah khân may hôm gŭ ta Gâp nâng, jêh ri nau Gâp ngơi hôm gŭ ta khân may nâng, lah ndri moh ndơ khân may ŭch, dăn hŏm, khân may geh ngăn ro.
43015008	Lah khân may geh play ŏk, khân may oh mon Gâp ngăn, ndri dâng ăn Bơ̆ Gâp geh nau chrêk lơp.”
43015009	“Gâp lĕ rŏng ma khân may, tâm ban ma Bơ̆ Gâp lĕ rŏng ma Gâp đŏng. Ăn khân may hôm gŭ nâng hŏm ta nau rŏng Gâp.
43015010	Lah khân may jan kơt nau Gâp đă, khân may hôm gŭ nâng ta nau rŏng Gâp, tâm ban ma Gâp lĕ jan kơt nau Bơ̆ Gâp đă, jêh ri Gâp hôm gŭ nâng ta nau rŏng Păng đŏng.
43015011	Gâp mbơh nkoch dâng lĕ nau dja ma khân may, gay ma nau răm maak Gâp gŭ ta khân may, jêh ri khân may geh nau răm maak dŭt hô ngăn.
43015012	Dja nau Gâp đă ăn ma khân may, ăn khân may tâm rŏng ndrăng khân may nơm, tâm ban ma Gâp lĕ rŏng ma khân may đŏng.
43015013	Bunuyh i jao săk păng nơm khât ma mât jăng păng, păng rŏng ma mât jăng i nây dŭt hô rlau bu.
43015014	Khân may jêng mât jăng Gâp ngăn, lah khân may jan kơt nau Gâp đă.
43015015	Gâp mâu ôh hôm kuăl khân may bunuyh sơm kơl jan kar jât, yorlah bunuyh sơm kơl jan kar mâu ôh gĭt moh nau kôranh păng nơm jan. Gâp kuăl khân may jêng mât jăng Gâp nơm, yorlah dâng lĕ nau Bơ̆ Gâp lah ma Gâp, lĕ Gâp mbơh nkoch ăn ma khân may gĭt dadê.
43015016	Mâu ôh khân may lĕ kơih Gâp, Gâp i kơih khân may, jêh ri đă khân may hăn geh play ŏk, play i hôm nâng n'ho ro. Lah ndri moh ndơ khân may dăn bơh Bơ̆ Gâp ta rnha săk Gâp, Păng ăn ma khân may ro.
43015017	Dja nau Gâp đă ma khân may: Ăn khân may tâm rŏng ndrăng khân may nơm.”
43015018	“Lah bunuyh ta neh ntu dja biănh ma khân may, ăn khân may kah gĭt khân păng lĕ biănh ma Gâp lor.
43015019	Lah khân may jêng tâm ban ma dâng lĕ bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp, khân păng rŏng ma khân may jêng băl mpôl. Yơn ma khân may mâu ôh hôm jêng tâm ban ma khân păng, yorlah lĕ Gâp kơih sŏ khân may lôh tă bơh khân păng, kơt ndri dâng khân păng biănh ma khân may.
43015020	Ăn khân may kah gĭt nau Gâp lĕ lah ma khân may nơh: ‘Bunuyh sơm kơl jan kar mâu ôh kuŏng rlau kôranh păng’. Lah bu jan jêr ma Gâp, khân may nây bu jan jêr đŏng, lah bu iăt nau Gâp, khân may nây bu iăt đŏng.
43015021	Bu jan dâng lĕ nau i nây ma khân may yor ma Gâp, jêh ri yor ma khân păng mâu ôh gĭt năl Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp.
43015022	Lah Gâp mâu geh văch ta neh ntu dja, mâu geh mbơh nkoch ma khân păng, khân păng mâu ôh geh nau tih. Yơn ma aƀaơ dja, khân păng mâu ôh hôm geh nau ma nsih ma nau tih khân păng nơm.
43015023	Bu moh biănh ma Gâp, păng biănh đŏng ma Bơ̆ Gâp.
43015024	Lah Gâp mâu geh jan nau khlay ta năp măt khân păng, jêng ndơ i mâu geh ôh du huê bunuyh êng jan, khân păng mâu geh ôh nau tih. Yơn ma aƀaơ dja khân păng lĕ say jêh, jêh ri khân păng hôm biănh ma Gâp, biănh ma Bơ̆ Gâp đŏng.
43015025	Kơt ndri nau i dja jêng di đah ma Nau Kôranh Brah Ngơi lĕ geh nchih ma ndơ khân păng jan: ‘Khân păng biănh ma Gâp mâu ôh geh nau’.”
43015026	“Gâp mra njuăl Nơm kơl tă bơh Bơ̆ Gâp ma khân may, Păng i nây Brah Huêng Ueh, Păng leo khân may ta nau nti ngăn. Tât Păng văch ri tay, Păng jêng tơm mbơh nkoch nau khlay Gâp ăn bu gĭt.
43015027	Jêh ri khân may jêng nơm mbơh nkoch nau khlay Gâp ăn bu gĭt kơt ndri đŏng, yorlah khân may lĕ gŭ ndrel Gâp ntơm bơh Gâp ntơm ntŭm nti bu nơh ngăn.”
43016001	Brah Yêsu lah jât: “Gâp ngơi nau i nây ma khân may, gay ma lơi ôh khân may bah nsing ma Gâp.
43016002	Yorlah bu mra ntrŭt khân may du lôh bơh nhih rƀŭn phung Israel bân. Jêh ri nar jât năp tay bu moh nkhât khân may, khân păng mân lah ndơ khân păng jan i nây, khân păng jan ndơ i Kôranh Brah rnê.
43016003	Khân păng jan kơt nây, yorlah khân păng mâu gĭt năl Bơ̆ Gâp, ndrel ma mâu gĭt năl Gâp đŏng.
43016004	Gâp lĕ ngơi nau i nây ma khân may, gay ma tât di nar i nây tay, khân may kah gĭt nau Gâp lĕ ntĭnh ma khân may. A lor nơh Gâp ê hŏ ôh mbơh nkoch dâng lĕ nau i nây, yorlah Gâp hôm gŭ ndrel khân may.”
43016005	“Aƀaơ dja Gâp hăn sât a Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp, yơn ma ta mpôl khân may mâu geh ôh du huê ôp Gâp: ‘Ah ntŭk hăn may ri?’
43016006	Yơn ma khân may geh nau nklŏn rvê hô ngăn ta nuih n'hâm, tât tăng nau Gâp ngơi dja.
43016007	Gâp ŭch mbơh ăn khân may gĭt, nau Gâp du lôh bơh khân may geh nau khlay ngăn ma khân may. Lah Gâp mâu du lôh, Nơm kơl mâu ôh văch ta khân may. Yơn ma lah Gâp du lôh, tay Gâp njuăl Păng ăn ma khân may.
43016008	Nôk tât Păng ta dja tay, Păng pơk bôk tôr phung bunuyh ta neh ntu gĭt vât ma nau tih, ma nau sŏng, ndrel ma nau Kôranh Brah phat dôih.
43016009	Gĭt vât ma nau tih, yorlah phung bunuyh ta neh ntu lĕ geh nau tih yor ma mâu ŭch ôh nsing ma Gâp.
43016010	Gĭt vât ma nau sŏng, yorlah Gâp hăn sât ta Bơ̆ Gâp ndri say Gâp sŏng ngăn, jêh ri khân may mâu hôm ôh say Gâp.
43016011	Gĭt vât ma nau Kôranh Brah phat dôih, yorlah nau Kôranh Brah tê̆ dôih ma Satăng i kôranh mpôl brah djơh i kôranh neh ntu dja, mra ăn bu gĭt n'hêl Kôranh Brah tê̆ dôih ma bunuyh i jan tih đŏng.”
43016012	“Hôm ŏk jât nau Gâp ŭch mbơh nkoch ăn ma khân may, yơn ma khân may mâu ôh dơi ndjôt aƀaơ dja.
43016013	Nôk Brah Huêng Ueh i leo nau nti ngăn tât, tay Păng leo khân may ăn gĭt năl dâng lĕ nau ngăn. Dâng lĕ nau Păng mbơh nkoch i nây, mâu ôh geh lôh tă bơh săk Păng nơm ŭch. Păng mbơh nkoch dâng lĕ nau Păng lĕ tăng bơh Bơ̆ Gâp, ndrel ma mbơh nkoch ăn khân may gĭt lor moh nau geh ta nar jât năp dja tay.
43016014	Păng mra ăn Gâp geh nau chrêk lơp, yorlah dâng lĕ nau Păng mbơh nkoch ăn ma khân may, Păng sŏ tă bơh Gâp dadê.
43016015	Dâng lĕ ndơ Bơ̆ Gâp geh, jêng ndơ Gâp dadê. Kơt ndri dâng Gâp lĕ lah, dâng lĕ nau Brah Huêng Ueh mbơh nkoch ăn ma khân may, Păng sŏ tă bơh Gâp dadê.”
43016016	“Hôm du ƀlât jât khân may mâu ôh hôm say Gâp, yơn ma hôm du ƀlât jât năp jât khân may say tay Gâp.”
43016017	Jêh ri mpôl oh mon aƀă tâm lah ndrăng khân păng nơm: “Moh nau Păng ŭch lah: ‘Hôm du ƀlât jât khân may mâu ôh hôm say Gâp, yơn ma hôm du ƀlât jât năp tay khân may say tay Gâp’, ndrel ma lah: ‘Gâp hăn ta Bơ̆ Gâp’, i nây hiah?”
43016018	Khân păng tâm lah tay ndrăng khân păng: “Nau Păng lah: ‘Hôm du ƀlât jât’, moh geh nau khlay? Bân mâu vât ôh, moh nau Păng ŭch lah!”
43016019	Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt khân păng ŭch ôp Păng, ndri Păng lah: “Khân may tâm ôp ndrăng khân may nơm, moh nau Gâp ŭch lah bơh? Gâp lah: ‘Hôm du ƀlât jât khân may mâu ôh hôm say Gâp, yơn ma hôm du ƀlât jât năp jât khân may say tay Gâp’.”
43016020	“Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may: Khân may tay nhhiăng nhŭm, yơn ma phung bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp răm maak. Khân may tay geh nau nklŏn rvê ôh êt ôh êl ngăn, yơn ma nau nklŏn rvê khân may i nây tay plăch jêng nau răm maak chrao.
43016021	Lŏng bu ur, dôl păng bơi gŭ oh, păng geh nau ji ndŭl hô ngăn, yơn ma tât păng lĕ jêh gŭ oh, păng chuêl nau ji i nây, păng răm maak, yorlah say geh oh bê mhe.
43016022	Aƀaơ dja khân may tâm ban kơt nây đŏng, khân may geh nau nklŏn rvê, yơn ma Gâp tâm mâp tay đah khân may du tơ̆ jât. Nôk nây khân may geh nau răm maak ngăn, mâu geh ôh bunuyh dơi pit nau răm maak khân may.
43016023	Nôk nây khân may mâu ôh hôm ôp Gâp du ntil nau. Gâp lah n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn ma khân may, moh ndơ khân may dăn bơh Bơ̆ ta rnha săk Gâp, Păng ăn ro ma khân may.
43016024	Tât ma aƀaơ dja, khân may ê hŏ ôh geh dăn ndơ bơh Bơ̆ ta rnha săk Gâp. Khân may dăn hŏm, geh ngăn ro, jêh ri khân may geh nau răm maak dŭt hô ngăn.”
43016025	“Gâp mbơh nkoch dâng lĕ nau i nây ăn ma khân may ma nau ngơi ntât. Yơn ma hôm du ƀlât jât Gâp mâu ôh hôm ngơi nau ntât, jêh ri nau Bơ̆ Gâp, Gâp ngơi ăn ma khân may n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn.
43016026	Ta nar i nây, khân may dăn êng bơh Bơ̆ ta rnha săk Gâp. Gâp mâu ôh sơm dăn bơh Bơ̆ ăn ma khân may,
43016027	yorlah Bơ̆ nơm rŏng ma khân may. Păng rŏng ma khân may, yorlah khân may lĕ rŏng ma Gâp, ndrel ma khân may lĕ iăt Gâp lôh tă bơh Kôranh Brah.
43016028	Gâp lôh tă bơh Bơ̆ jŭr ta neh ntu dja nơh, aƀaơ dja Gâp lôh bơh neh ntu dja plơ̆ sât tay ta Păng.”
43016029	Mpôl oh mon Brah Yêsu lah: “Aƀaơ dja May ngơi ma hên lĕ n'hêl nanê̆, May mâu ôh hôm ngơi nau ntât.
43016030	Aƀaơ dja hên lĕ gĭt jêh May gĭt dadê dâng lĕ ntil ndơ. May mâu khăch ôh geh bu ôp May lor, yorlah May lĕ gĭt êng jêh moh ndơ nau mân ta nuih n'hâm bu. Kơt ndri dâng hên iăt, May tă bơh Kôranh Brah ngăn.”
43016031	Brah Yêsu ôp khân păng: “Aƀaơ dja khân may lĕ iăt ngăn bơh?
43016032	Yơn ma tât di mong nây, aƀaơ dja mong i nây lĕ bơi tât, khân may nchuăt du gŭ ntŭk êng êng, tâng nhih jay khân may nơm, ntlơi Gâp gŭ êng. Yơn ma Gâp mâu geh ôh gŭ êng, geh Bơ̆ nơm gŭ ndrel Gâp.
43016033	Gâp mbơh nkoch nau i nây ma khân may, gay ma khân may geh nau đăp mpăn yor ma khân may nsing ma Gâp. Hôm gŭ ta neh ntu dja, khân may hôm geh mâp nau jêr, yơn ma lơi ôh klach rvê, yorlah dâng lĕ ndơ ta neh ntu dja Gâp lĕ dơi dadê jêh.”
43017001	Jêh Brah Yêsu ngơi nau nây, Păng n'gơr jât trôk ti, jêh ri lah: “Ơ Bơ̆! Aƀaơ dja lĕ tât di mong. Dăn May jan ăn Gâp i Kon May geh nau chrêk lơp, gay ma Gâp i Kon jan ăn May geh nau chrêk lơp đŏng.
43017002	Kơt May lĕ ăn nau dơi ma Gâp dơi mât uănh dâng lĕ rngôch bunuyh, gay ma Gâp ăn nau rêh n'ho ro ma dâng lĕ bunuyh i May lĕ ăn jêh ma Gâp.
43017003	Geh du huê May dơm i brah ngăn ngên. Bunuyh i geh nau rêh n'ho ro tă bơh gĭt năl May, ndrel ma gĭt năl Gâp i Yêsu Krist i May njuăl đă hăn.
43017004	Gâp lĕ jan ăn May geh nau chrêk lơp ta neh ntu dja, yor ma lĕ lôch jan jêh kar May đă Gâp jan nơh.
43017005	Ơ Bơ̆! Aƀaơ dja dăn May ăn Gâp nau chrêk lơp i Bân lĕ ơm geh ndrel nôk ê hŏ geh trôk neh ntu nơh.”
43017006	“Bu moh bunuyh ta neh ntu dja May lĕ ăn jêh ma Gâp, Gâp lĕ ăn phung i nây gĭt năl May. Bơh ntơm nơh phung i nây jêng ƀon lan May, jêh ri May ăn khân păng ma Gâp. Khân păng lĕ ndjôt dâng lĕ nau May.
43017007	Aƀaơ dja khân păng lĕ gĭt dâng lĕ nau Gâp jan nau Gâp nti, lôh tă bơh May nơm ăn dadê.
43017008	Dâng lĕ nau May ăn ma Gâp nơh, lĕ Gâp ăn ma khân păng dadê. Lĕ khân păng sŏ dơn dadê, ndrel ma khân păng lĕ gĭt n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn Gâp lôh tă bơh May, khân păng iăt ngăn May i nơm njuăl đă Gâp hăn.”
43017009	“Gâp mbơh sơm dăn ăn ma khân păng, Gâp mâu ôh mbơh sơm dăn ăn ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu, Gâp mbơh sơm dăn ăn ma bu moh May lĕ ăn jêh ma Gâp, yorlah khân păng i nây jêng ƀon lan May.
43017010	Jêh ri dâng lĕ ƀon lan May jêng ƀon lan Gâp, dâng lĕ ƀon lan Gâp jêng ƀon lan May đŏng. Khân păng jan ăn Gâp geh nau chrêk lơp.
43017011	Gâp mâu ôh hôm gŭ ta neh ntu dja, Gâp plơ̆ sât tay ta May, yơn ma khân păng hôm gŭ ta neh ntu dja. Ơ Bơ̆, May kloh ueh ngăn, mât njrăng khân păng ma nau dơi May nơm i May lĕ ăn ma Gâp đŏng, gay ma khân păng gŭ tâm rnglăp băl hŏ, tâm ban ma Bân gŭ tâm rnglăp băl đŏng.
43017012	Nôk Gâp hôm gŭ ndrel khân păng ta neh ntu, Gâp mât njrăng khân păng ma nau dơi May nơm i May lĕ ăn ma Gâp nơh. Bu moh bunuyh May lĕ ăn ma Gâp, mâu geh ôh du huê roh hêng, yơn ma hôm geh roh hêng du huê, i nây jêng tâm di ma nau lĕ geh nchih jêh.”
43017013	“Aƀaơ dja Gâp hăn a May, yơn ma Gâp ngơi nau dja dôl Gâp hôm gŭ ta neh ntu, gay ma ta nuih n'hâm khân păng geh nau răm maak dŭt hô ngăn kơt Gâp đŏng.
43017014	Gâp lĕ ăn nau May ma khân păng. Bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp, bunuyh i nây biănh ma khân păng, yorlah khân păng nơh mâu geh ôh du ntôr nau ndrel bunuyh mâu nsing ma Gâp, tâm ban ma Gâp mâu đŏng du ntôr nau ndrel bunuyh mâu nsing ma Gâp.
43017015	Gâp mâu ôh dăn May sŏ khân păng lôh bơh neh ntu dja, Gâp dăn May njrăng khân păng bơh Satăng i kôranh mpôl brah djơh.
43017016	Khân păng mâu ôh du ntôr nau ndrel bunuyh mâu nsing ma Gâp, tâm ban ma Gâp mâu đŏng du ntôr nau ndrel bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp.
43017017	Dăn jan khân păng jêng phung ƀon lan May nơm, gŭ ngao tâm di đah nau ngăn. Nau ngơi May jêng nau ngăn.
43017018	Gâp đă khân păng hăn ta nklang phung bunuyh i mâu nsing ma Gâp, tâm ban ma May lĕ đă Gâp ăn hăn ta nklang phung bunuyh i mâu nsing ma May đŏng.
43017019	Gâp jao săk Gâp nơm ma khân păng, gay ma ăn khân păng jêng phung ƀon lan May nơm ngăn.”
43017020	“Gâp mâu ôh dơn mbơh sơm dăn ăn ma mpôl oh mon Gâp dja dơm, Gâp ŭch mbơh sơm dăn đŏng ăn dâng lĕ bunuyh êng i mra nsing ma Gâp tă bơh nau khân păng mbơh nkoch,
43017021	gay ma dâng lĕ khân păng gŭ tâm rnglăp băl hŏ. Ơ Bơ̆! Tâm ban ma May gŭ ta Gâp, Gâp gŭ ta May, dăn ăn khân păng i nây gŭ ta Bân đŏng, gay ma ăn dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja bu iăt May i Nơm tơm njuăl Gâp.
43017022	Nau chrêk lơp i May lĕ ăn ma Gâp, lĕ Gâp ăn ma khân păng, gay ma khân păng gŭ tâm rnglăp băl, tâm ban ma Bân tâm rnglăp băl đŏng.
43017023	May gŭ ta Gâp, Gâp gŭ ta khân păng, gay ma ăn khân păng gŭ tâm rnglăp băl n'hêl nanê̆ ngăn, gay ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja bu gĭt lah May ngăn i Nơm tơm njuăl ăn Gâp hăn ta dja, ndrel ma dâng lĕ bunuyh ta neh ntu dja bu gĭt lah nau May rŏng ma khân păng tâm ban ma May rŏng Gâp đŏng.”
43017024	“Ơ Bơ̆! Gâp ŭch ăn bu moh May ăn ma Gâp, ăn khân păng i nây gŭ ndrel Gâp ta ntŭk Gâp gŭ nây đŏng, gay ma ăn khân păng say nau chrêk lơp May lĕ ăn ma Gâp, yorlah May lĕ rŏng ma Gâp bơh ê hŏ geh trôk neh ntu nơh ngăn.
43017025	Ơ Bơ̆! May sŏng ngăn. Bunuyh ta neh ntu dja bu mâu ôh gĭt năl May, yơn ma Gâp gĭt năl May, jêh ri khân păng i dja lĕ gĭt lah, May ngăn njuăl đă Gâp hăn ta dja.
43017026	Lĕ Gâp ăn khân păng gĭt năl May, Gâp hôm jan kơt nây nâng, gay ma nau rŏng May ma Gâp gŭ ta khân păng, jêh ri Gâp nơm gŭ ta khân păng đŏng.”
43018001	Jêh Brah Yêsu mbơh sơm kơt nây, Păng hăn ndrel mpôl oh mon Păng kăl ti n'hong Kêdrôn. Ta ntŭk nây geh du lôk mir tơm Ôlive, khân păng lăp ta mir nây.
43018002	Yuđas-Isakariyôt bunuyh rlăng ma Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt ntŭk nây, yorlah Brah Yêsu, ndrel ma mpôl oh mon Păng vay hăn ta ntŭk nây ŏk tơ̆.
43018003	Jêh ri Yuđas-Isakariyôt leo du mpôl tahen Rôm, ndrel ma du mpôl tahen nhih jan brah hăn ta ntŭk nây. Khân păng ndjôt nđâp ma ŭnh rdo, ŭnh sagêng, nđâp ma tak đao ngăn. Geh mpôl kôranh jan brah, ndrel ma phung Pharisi lĕ ăn phung tahen i nây hăn ndrel Yuđas-Isakariyôt.
43018004	Brah Yêsu lĕ gĭt lor moh ndơ geh ma Păng, kơt ndri dâng Păng hăn mâp ôp phung i nây, Păng lah: “Bu moh khân may ŭch joi?”
43018005	Khân păng ơh: “Joi Yêsu tă bơh ƀon Nasaret.” Brah Yêsu ơh: “Gâp dja.” Yuđas-Isakariyôt bunuyh rlăng ma Brah Yêsu gŭ ndrel phung tahen ta nây đŏng.
43018006	Nôk Brah Yêsu lah: “Gâp dja.” Khân păng rŭch nkơi chôt trach.
43018007	Brah Yêsu ôp tay khân păng: “Bu moh khân may ŭch joi?” Khân păng ơh: “Joi Yêsu tă bơh ƀon Nasaret.”
43018008	Brah Yêsu lah ma khân păng: “Gâp lĕ lah ma khân may, Gâp dja heh. Lah khân may ŭch joi Gâp, ăn mpôl khân păng dja sât.”
43018009	Nau Păng ngơi kơt nây tâm di đah nau Păng lĕ lah nơh: “Bu moh bunuyh May lĕ ăn ma Gâp, mâu geh ôh du huê roh hêng.”
43018010	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng geh du n'gŏr đao, păng tăk đao sreh du huê dâk kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng tăch tôr bơh ma, rnha dâk i nây Mălkus.
43018011	Brah Yêsu lah ma Pêtrôs: “Ntrŭp hŏm đao may nây ta ndrôm. Mơm dâng Gâp mâu sŏ dơn nau jŏk jêr Bơ̆ Gâp ăn ma Gâp?”
43018012	Jêh ri phung tahen, ndrel ma kôranh tahen khân păng, nđâp ma phung tahen nhih jan brah nhŭp chăp Brah Yêsu.
43018013	Khân păng leo Brah Yêsu hăn mâp Anas i bơ̆ po Kaiphas lor, Kaiphas jêng kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng nôk năm nây.
43018014	Kaiphas i nây lah ma mpôl kôranh phung Israel nôk tâm nchră nơh: “Ueh đê̆ geh khât du huê bunuyh ăn ma dâng lĕ phung ƀon lan.”
43018015	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng, ndrel ma du huê oh mon êng jât hăn tâng Brah Yêsu. Kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng năl du huê oh mon i nây, kơt ndri dâng bu ăn păng lăp ndrel Brah Yêsu ta trôm jŏng gung jay Anas nây.
43018016	Yơn ma Pêtrôs hôm gŭ bơh dih mpông mpêr ri. Kơt ndri oh mon Brah Yêsu i kôranh jan brah nây năl, hăn ngơi ma bu ur gŭ njrăng ta bôk mpông, jêh ri leo Pêtrôs lăp ta trôm jŏng gung nây đŏng.
43018017	Bu ur i nây ôp Pêtrôs: “May oh mon Păng i ri đŏng ƀah?” Pêtrôs ơh: “Mâu ôh.”
43018018	Phung dâk ta jay i nây, ndrel ma phung tahen nhih jan brah lĕ sŭnh ŭnh ma saônh, jêh ri gŭ njŏr ŭnh, yorlah bri nđik ngăn. Pêtrôs gŭ njŏr ŭnh ndrel bu ta nây đŏng.
43018019	Jêh ri kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng ôp Brah Yêsu ma mpôl oh mon Păng, ndrel ma nau Păng nti lah.
43018020	Brah Yêsu ơh: “Gâp lĕ ngơi ăn ma dâng lĕ bunuyh say, Gâp vay nti lah ta trôm nhih rƀŭn phung bân, ndrel ma ta jŏng gung nhih jan brah, jêng dâng lĕ ntŭk phung Israel gŭ gum. Gâp mâu geh ôh ngơi êng ta njônh njănh.
43018021	Moh may ôp Gâp? May ôp phung i tăng nau Gâp ngơi ri eh, yorlah phung i nây lĕ gĭt dadê moh ƀă nau Gâp ngơi.”
43018022	Jêh Brah Yêsu ngơi kơt nây, geh du huê tahen nhih jan brah gŭ dăch kêng Păng, tap Brah Yêsu, jêh ri lah: “Mơm May bănh ngơi kơt nây ma kôranh jan brah?”
43018023	Brah Yêsu ơh: “Lah Gâp ngơi tih, dăn mbơh moh nau tih. Yơn ma lah Gâp ngơi di, moh si kô̆ dâng may lơh Gâp?”
43018024	Jêh ri Anas ăn bu njŭn Brah Yêsu ma Kaiphas i kôranh jan brah dŭt kuŏng, nđâp ma kât ti ma rse.
43018025	Simôn i bu kuăl Pêtrôs đŏng hôm gŭ njŏr ŭnh ta ri. Geh du huê ôp păng: “May oh mon Păng i ri đŏng ƀah?” Pêtrôs rlăch: “Mâu ôh!”
43018026	Geh du huê dâk kôranh jan brah, păng i nây ndŭl mpôl đah bunuyh i Pêtrôs de sreh tăch tôr ri nơh, ôp păng: “Ơm mâu di lah may i nây ngăn gâp say gŭ ndrel Păng ta mir tơm Ôlive ri nơh?”
43018027	Pêtrôs rlăch tay jât, ta nây dô ma geh iăr ndrau ro.
43018028	Tât bri bơi ma ang, bu leo Brah Yêsu lôh bơh jay Kaiphas, hăn ta jay Pilat i kôranh kuŏng ta bri Yuđa, păng phung Rôm. Phung Israel mâu bănh ôh lăp ta trôm jay păng nây, yorlah lah lăp ta jay bunuyh i mâu di phung Israel mâu hôm kloh tâng nau vay khân păng, lah ndri mâu hôm ôh dơi lăp nhêt ƀŭn n'hot.
43018029	Ndri dâng Pilat lôh a dih hăn mâp khân păng, ôp khân păng: “Moh nau khân may ŭch ntôn ma Bunuyh dja?”
43018030	Khân păng ơh: “Lah Păng mâu geh nau tih kuŏng, hên mâu ôh leo Păng ta may, kôranh!”
43018031	Pilat lah ma khân păng: “Khân may sŏ Păng phat dôih tâng nau vay khân may nơm dô.” Mpôl kôranh phung Israel mbơh ma păng: “Phung Rôm khân may dơm dơi tê̆ dôih nkhât bunuyh.”
43018032	Ndơ i nây jêng tâm di đah ma nau Brah Yêsu lĕ ngơi, a mơm nau Păng khât.
43018033	Jêh ri Pilat lăp tay ta trôm jay, đă bu leo Brah Yêsu ta păng, jêh ri ôp: “Ngăn lah May nơh kađăch phung Israel?”
43018034	Brah Yêsu lah: “Nau may ôp kơt nây, tă bơh săk may nơm, mâu lah geh bu êng sơm mbơh?”
43018035	Pilat ơh: “May lĕ gĭt jêh, gâp dja mâu di ôh phung Israel. Phung May nơm, ndrel ma mpôl kôranh jan brah May nơm njŭn May ma gâp, lah ndri moh ƀă nau May lĕ jan?”
43018036	Brah Yêsu lah: “Bri dak Gâp mât uănh mâu geh ôh ta neh ntu dja. Lah bri dak Gâp ta neh ntu dja, phung oh mon Gâp hăn tâm lơh ro, mâu ăn ôh bu njŭn Gâp ta ti mpôl kôranh phung Israel. Yơn ma bri dak Gâp mâu geh ôh ta neh ntu dja.”
43018037	Pilat ôp Brah Yêsu: “Lah ndri May kađăch ngăn ƀah?” Brah Yêsu ơh: “May lah Gâp kađăch nây di ngăn. Gâp deh, Gâp văch ta neh ntu dja gay ma mbơh nkoch nau ngăn. Bu moh i rŏng ma nau ngăn, păng i nây iăt nau Gâp ngơi.”
43018038	Pilat ôp Brah Yêsu: “A mơm nau ngăn?” Jêh Pilat ngơi kơt nây, jêh ri păng hăn lôh a dih mâp tay mpôl kôranh phung Israel du tơ̆ jât, păng lah ma khân păng: “Bunuyh dja, gâp mâu ôh say Păng geh nau tih, đê̆ mâu ơm.”
43018039	“Yơn ma khân may geh nau vay ăn gâp ƀơk du huê bunuyh dôih nôk nar nhêt ƀŭn n'hot dja. Lah ndri khân may ŭch đŏng ăn gâp ƀơk Kađăch phung Israel dja?”
43018040	Jêh ri bu nter drơu lah: “May lơi ôh ƀơk Păng, may ƀơk Ƀaraƀas hŏ.” Ƀaraƀas nây bunuyh ntŭng.
43019001	Jêh ri Pilat leo Brah Yêsu lăp ta trôm jay, đă tahen rpăt Păng ma mŏng rse.
43019002	Phung tahen sŏ rtao lok ƀăr jan môk kađăch ndô ta bôk Brah Yêsu ri, jêh ri sŏ ao chăng kuŏng i tâm ban ma ao kađăch nsoh ăn Ôbăl nsoh đŏng.
43019003	Khân păng hăn dăch ta Brah Yêsu, mưch lah ma Păng: “Ơ Kađăch phung Israel, hên mbah ma May” jêh ri tap Ôbăl ta muh măt.
43019004	Jêh ri Pilat hăn lôh a dih mâp tay mpôl kôranh phung Israel du tơ̆ jât, lah ma khân păng: “Dja, gâp leo Păng ma khân may, gay ma ăn khân may gĭt, gâp mâu ôh say Păng geh nau tih ma tê̆ dôih Păng jât.”
43019005	Nôk nây Brah Yêsu lôh a dih đŏng, nđâp ma ndô môk kađăch jan ma lok, ndrel ma nsoh ao chăng. Pilat lah: “Dja, uănh hŏm Bunuyh dja!”
43019006	Tât ma mpôl kôranh jan brah, ndrel ma mpôl tahen nhih jan brah say Brah Yêsu, khân păng nter drơu: “Nkhât Păng ta si tâm rkăng! Nkhât Păng ta si tâm rkăng!” Pilat lah: “Khân may sŏ Păng, nkhât êng Păng ta si tâm rkăng, yorlah gâp mâu ôh say Păng geh nau tih.”
43019007	Mpôl kôranh phung Israel lah ma Pilat: “Phung hên geh nau vay, tâng ma nau vay hên Bunuyh i nây iăt ma nkhât lơi, yorlah Păng kơp êng săk Păng nơm lah Kon Kôranh Brah.”
43019008	Tât Pilat tăng kơt nây, păng lơ hô klach.
43019009	Jêh ri Pilat plơ̆ lăp tay ta trôm jay, ôp Brah Yêsu: “May bơh tă?” Yơn ma Brah Yêsu mâu ơh ôh.
43019010	Pilat lah Brah Yêsu: “Moh May mâu ŭch ơh ma gâp mêh? May mâu gĭt gâp geh nau dơi? Ŭch ƀơk May kađôi, mâu lah ŭch nkhât May ta si tâm rkăng kađôi.”
43019011	Brah Yêsu lah ma Pilat: “Lah mâu geh nau dơi tă bơh Kôranh Brah ăn ma may, may mâu ôh geh nau dơi ma Gâp, kơt ndri bunuyh i njŭn Gâp ma may, khân păng geh nau tih jru rlau may ngăn.”
43019012	Ntơm bơh nôk nây, Pilat joi nau gay ma ŭch ƀơk Brah Yêsu đŏng, yơn ma mpôl kôranh phung Israel nter drơu: “Lah may ƀơk Bunuyh i nây, may mâu ôh du ntôr nau ma kôranh kađăch Sêsar, mâu ôh di mât jăng ndrel kôranh kađăch Sêsar, yorlah bu moh kơp êng săk păng nơm lah kađăch, păng i nây bunuyh rlăng ma kôranh kađăch Sêsar!”
43019013	Tât Pilat tăng nau nây, păng leo Brah Yêsu lôh a dih, gŭ ta rnơl phat dôih, ta ntŭk nây bu rnha lah: ‘Ntŭk lăk lŭ’, nau ngơi Hêbrơ lah: ‘Gapatha’.
43019014	Nar nây bu ndrăp nau nhêt ƀŭn n'hot, klăp lah nklang bôk nar. Pilat lah ma mpôl kôranh phung Israel: “Dja! Kađăch khân may.”
43019015	Yơn ma khân păng nter lah: “Nkhât lơi Păng! Nkhât lơi Păng! Nkhât Păng ta si tâm rkăng!” Pilat ôp khân păng: “Khân may ŭch ăn gâp nkhât kađăch khân may ta si tâm rkăng bơh?” Mpôl kôranh jan brah lah: “Rlao bơh kôranh kađăch Sêsar, hên mâu hôm ôh geh kađăch êng.”
43019016	Jêh ri Pilat ăn Brah Yêsu ma bu, ăn phung tahen nkhât Păng ta si tâm rkăng, jêh ri phung tahen leo Brah Yêsu lôh bơh nây.
43019017	Jêh ri Brah Yêsu lôh bơh ƀon tui si tâm rkăng, hăn ta ntŭk bu rnha lah: ‘Ntŭk nting bôk’, nau ngơi Hêbrơ lah: ‘Gôlgôtha’.
43019018	Bu nkhât Brah Yêsu ta si tâm rkăng ta ntŭk nây, geh bar hê bunuyh dôih bu nkhât ndrel Păng ta nây đŏng, du huê bơh chiao du huê bơh ma, Păng nklang n'gul.
43019019	Jêh ri Pilat ăn bu nchih nau mbơh ta du rlat kađar pla ta si tâm rkăng nây, ta nây geh nau lah: ‘Dja Yêsu, tă bơh ƀon Nasaret, Păng kađăch phung Israel’.
